localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

missions.localised_description: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nA nation cannot wage war without an army. We should recruit more forces, so that we are never imperilled.

missions.localised_description: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nA nation cannot wage war without an army. We should recruit more forces, so that we are never imperilled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nPerhaps we should consider peace? Anger is no way to lead a nation, nor keep people in line.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

missions.localised_description: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

missions.localised_description: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

missions.localised_description: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nThese are uncertain times, so if we have capacity for more armies, more should be raised.

missions.localised_description: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nThese are uncertain times, so if we have capacity for more armies, more should be raised.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nBy fielding more armies we will not have to spread our forces so thinly that they may be ineffective.

missions.localised_description: The military are crucial, for they are the authority from which all other is derived.\n\nBy fielding more armies we will not have to spread our forces so thinly that they may be ineffective.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

missions.localised_description: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

missions.localised_description: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThere is room for one to become governor; give power to one your trust, that that may aid in the burden of leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThis person has a trustworthy character and logical mind, and is recommended for the post of administrator.

missions.localised_description: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThis person has a trustworthy character and logical mind, and is recommended for the post of administrator.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThe toil of the nobles should be to lead the people; capable individuals stand by to take on such responsibilities.

missions.localised_description: Without able administration, the opportunity to decentralise power is wasted.\n\nThe toil of the nobles should be to lead the people; capable individuals stand by to take on such responsibilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

missions.localised_description: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

missions.localised_description: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

missions.localised_description: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThis discrete, quick-thinking and versatile person would perform admirably as a spy against our neighbours.

missions.localised_description: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nThis discrete, quick-thinking and versatile person would perform admirably as a spy against our neighbours.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Knowledge of others is power. Espionage is just as important in peacetime as in war.\n\nBy recruiting a spy, we can impose our will beyond our own borders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

missions.localised_description: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

missions.localised_description: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

missions.localised_description: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

missions.localised_description: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

missions.localised_description: If the true seat of power stays out of our grasp, our legitimacy will come into question.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

missions.localised_description: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

missions.localised_description: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

missions.localised_description: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nIt doesn't matter if the people's concerns are just, if rebellion goes unchecked it invites further chaos.

missions.localised_description: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nIt doesn't matter if the people's concerns are just, if rebellion goes unchecked it invites further chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nIgnorance of the people’s dissent has now escalated into rebellion; we must act now!

missions.localised_description: A grave oversight has led to an uprising of malcontents.\n\nIgnorance of the people’s dissent has now escalated into rebellion; we must act now!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a well-nourished populace, a civilisation can quickly crumble.\n\nThis dire predicament cannot continue - we need to increase our reserve infrastructure immediately!

missions.localised_description: Without a well-nourished populace, a civilisation can quickly crumble.\n\nThis dire predicament cannot continue - we need to increase our reserve infrastructure immediately!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a well-nourished populace, a civilisation can quickly crumble.\n\nMake our farms grow and thrive, as even the mightiest empire can starve!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a well-nourished populace, a civilisation can quickly crumble.\n\nWe must increase the output from our farms. Trade, construct, administer - do whatever must be done.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a well-nourished populace, a civilisation can quickly crumble.\n\nA starving populace cannot be controlled; may I suggest investing in farms and other means of food production?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

missions.localised_description: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

missions.localised_description: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nChaos does not wait for one to be ready before striking; we should fill the ranks through conscription.

missions.localised_description: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nChaos does not wait for one to be ready before striking; we should fill the ranks through conscription.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nWe have the capacity to bring more soldiers under the command of the retinues, we need only recruit them.

missions.localised_description: An army’s effectiveness is dependent on it being well-composed, and fully-manned.\n\nWe have the capacity to bring more soldiers under the command of the retinues, we need only recruit them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

missions.localised_description: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

missions.localised_description: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

missions.localised_description: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

missions.localised_description: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nWe have taken the neighbouring folk under our wing - with hard work and determination we can achieve much together.

missions.localised_description: An unruled, neighbouring territory is a rare opportunity for safe expansion.\n\nWe have taken the neighbouring folk under our wing - with hard work and determination we can achieve much together.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

missions.localised_description: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

missions.localised_description: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nThere is room in your court for more cultured, wisened courtiers; please, consider your options.

missions.localised_description: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nThere is room in your court for more cultured, wisened courtiers; please, consider your options.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nWe have received many recommendations for the court from our officials; perhaps it is time to select a candidate?

missions.localised_description: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nWe have received many recommendations for the court from our officials; perhaps it is time to select a candidate?

localised_description.last_approved_text: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nThere is an individual whose aptitude could potentially benefit many - you should offer them a position at court.

missions.localised_description: One cannot rule without sound advice from a grounded individual.\n\nThere is an individual whose aptitude could potentially benefit many - you should offer them a position at court.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

missions.localised_description: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

missions.localised_description: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nAn arm without a general is a sword-arm without a hand; worse than nothing. Put strong leaders in charge!

missions.localised_description: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nAn arm without a general is a sword-arm without a hand; worse than nothing. Put strong leaders in charge!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nThere are many different attributes that make a worthy general - do your candidates possesses any of them?

missions.localised_description: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nThere are many different attributes that make a worthy general - do your candidates possesses any of them?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nBy recruiting an additional general we will have the means to form a new force, should it be needed.

missions.localised_description: Commandership is a privilege granted only to the few who are worthy.\n\nBy recruiting an additional general we will have the means to form a new force, should it be needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

missions.localised_description: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nYou may consider putting one of your comrades into a ministerial position; their aid will surely be appreciated.

missions.localised_description: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nYou may consider putting one of your comrades into a ministerial position; their aid will surely be appreciated.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nA ministerial position must be filled - perhaps consider a courtier? Select them according to ability and loyalty.

missions.localised_description: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nA ministerial position must be filled - perhaps consider a courtier? Select them according to ability and loyalty.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nWise counsel is as valuable as a hundred armies or treasures; perhaps there is a suitable candidate at the court?

missions.localised_description: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nWise counsel is as valuable as a hundred armies or treasures; perhaps there is a suitable candidate at the court?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

missions.localised_description: The decisions of the wisest rulers are not made without counsel.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

missions.localised_description: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

missions.localised_description: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

missions.localised_description: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

missions.localised_description: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

missions.localised_description: No commandery matters should be overlooked if there are personnel to address them.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

missions.localised_description: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

missions.localised_description: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

missions.localised_description: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

missions.localised_description: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

missions.localised_description: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

missions.localised_description: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nOne of our provinces languishes from a lack of population. To take from others what we need is an ideal solution!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nDevelop your cities in such a way that might benefit the population and make them more likely to settle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must always be ready and embrace war when it finds us.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Strength dominates weakness. It is the way of things.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Uncontrolled, a fire will creep and crawl ever further, burning without conscience.\n\nA bigger conflict surely looms on the horizon, but for now we must repel the invaders and maintain control.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Uncontrolled, a fire will creep and crawl ever further, burning without conscience.\n\nThis force dares to march into our lands. There can be only one answer, surely?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Uncontrolled, a fire will creep and crawl ever further, burning without conscience.\n\nThis insurgency cannot be tolerated; there is no choice but to cast these interlopers back!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

missions.localised_description: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

missions.localised_description: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

missions.localised_description: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nThese are uncertain times, so if we have capacity for more armies, more should be raised.

missions.localised_description: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nThese are uncertain times, so if we have capacity for more armies, more should be raised.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nBy fielding more armies we will not have to spread our forces so thinly that they may be ineffective.

missions.localised_description: The simplest path to victory is through smart tactics and overwhelming force.\n\nBy fielding more armies we will not have to spread our forces so thinly that they may be ineffective.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

missions.localised_description: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

missions.localised_description: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThere is room for one to become governor; give power to one your trust, that that may aid in the burden of leadership.

missions.localised_description: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThere is room for one to become governor; give power to one your trust, that that may aid in the burden of leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThis person has a trustworthy character and logical mind, and is recommended for the post of administrator.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThe toil of the nobles should be to lead the people; capable individuals stand by to take on such responsibilities.

missions.localised_description: Good governance is the stable foundation upon which success is built.\n\nThe toil of the nobles should be to lead the people; capable individuals stand by to take on such responsibilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

missions.localised_description: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

missions.localised_description: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

missions.localised_description: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nThis discrete, quick-thinking and versatile person would perform admirably as a spy against our neighbours.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the cavalry charges, those who fight in shadow are just as powerful.\n\nBy recruiting a spy, we can impose our will beyond our own borders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

missions.localised_description: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

localised_description.last_approved_text: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

missions.localised_description: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

missions.localised_description: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

localised_description.last_approved_text: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

missions.localised_description: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

missions.localised_description: War is costly for us all, but the loss of our capital is a titanic blow.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

missions.localised_description: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

missions.localised_description: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rise against perceived injustice; it is the ruler's duty to quell them.\n\nIt doesn't matter if the people's concerns are just, if rebellion goes unchecked it invites further chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A strong general can lead, but only strong men will follow. This is the nature of war. \n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

missions.localised_description: A strong general can lead, but only strong men will follow. This is the nature of war. \n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A strong general can lead, but only strong men will follow. This is the nature of war. \n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

missions.localised_description: A strong general can lead, but only strong men will follow. This is the nature of war. \n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A strong general can lead, but only strong men will follow. This is the nature of war. \n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

localised_description.last_approved_text: China is vast. In darkened corners of the map there lies opportunity.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China is vast. In darkened corners of the map there lies opportunity.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China is vast. In darkened corners of the map there lies opportunity.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China is vast. In darkened corners of the map there lies opportunity.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Any great warlord is aided and sustained by the great ministries.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

missions.localised_description: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

missions.localised_description: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

missions.localised_description: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

missions.localised_description: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

missions.localised_description: A noble heart must have purpose, lest it stagnate to petty dreams and bitter thoughts.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

missions.localised_description: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

missions.localised_description: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

missions.localised_description: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

missions.localised_description: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

missions.localised_description: Like a vessel overflowing, a city can only sustain so many people.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

missions.localised_description: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nOne of our provinces languishes from a lack of population. To take from others what we need is an ideal solution!

missions.localised_description: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nOne of our provinces languishes from a lack of population. To take from others what we need is an ideal solution!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nDevelop your cities in such a way that might benefit the population and make them more likely to settle.

missions.localised_description: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nDevelop your cities in such a way that might benefit the population and make them more likely to settle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

missions.localised_description: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Every vessel - be it a wineskin or a province - not filled is but wasted potential. \n\nTo increase migration and habitation into areas which require them, we must construct buildings that encourage both.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have, in the quest to defeat the chaos, made an enemy.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have, in the quest to defeat the chaos, made an enemy.\n\nA nation cannot wage war without an army. We should recruit more forces, so that we are never imperilled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have, in the quest to defeat the chaos, made an enemy.\n\nPerhaps we should consider peace? Anger is no way to lead a nation, nor keep people in line.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When enemies tread upon our soil it can mean only one thing.\n\nA bigger conflict surely looms on the horizon, but for now we must repel the invaders and maintain control.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When enemies tread upon our soil it can mean only one thing.\n\nThis force dares to march into our lands. There can be only one answer, surely?

localised_description.last_approved_text: When enemies tread upon our soil it can mean only one thing.\n\nThis insurgency cannot be tolerated; there is no choice but to cast these interlopers back!

localised_description.last_approved_text: To be master of another is not to be harsh, but firm; unyielding, yet benevolent. \n\nIf a vassal has such willingness to pledge themselves to us, it would be foolish not to assert our control over them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To be master of another is not to be harsh, but firm; unyielding, yet benevolent. \n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To be master of another is not to be harsh, but firm; unyielding, yet benevolent. \n\nOnly one can unify China - if you absorb this nation, your hegemony will grow closer!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wisdom heralds victory, but a large force, also, portends advantage.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wisdom heralds victory, but a large force, also, portends advantage.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wisdom heralds victory, but a large force, also, portends advantage.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

missions.localised_description: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

missions.localised_description: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nThere is room for one to become governor; give power to one your trust, that that may aid in the burden of leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nThis person has a trustworthy character and logical mind, and is recommended for the post of administrator.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In a strong empire, all must carry their weight.\n\nThe toil of the nobles should be to lead the people; capable individuals stand by to take on such responsibilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

missions.localised_description: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

missions.localised_description: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

missions.localised_description: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nThis discrete, quick-thinking and versatile person would perform admirably as a spy against our neighbours.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To know our enemy is half the battle won.\n\nBy recruiting a spy, we can impose our will beyond our own borders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

missions.localised_description: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

missions.localised_description: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

missions.localised_description: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

localised_description.last_approved_text: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

missions.localised_description: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

missions.localised_description: A snake cannot live without the head; it may thrash and rive, but ultimately it will die.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

missions.localised_description: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nIt doesn't matter if the people's concerns are just, if rebellion goes unchecked it invites further chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the right of the people to revolt, though it may lead to subjugation.\n\nIgnorance of the people’s dissent has now escalated into rebellion; we must act now!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fields return measly yields; if this continues, the dark times will only get darker.\n\nThis dire predicament cannot continue - we need to increase our reserves immediately!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fields return measly yields; if this continues, the dark times will only get darker.\n\nMake our farms grow and thrive, as even the mightiest empire can starve!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A localised weakness, if left to develop, will soon become weaken us all. \n\nBy bolstering local food production in the commandery, the famine there can be alleviated.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

missions.localised_description: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

missions.localised_description: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

missions.localised_description: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nChaos does not wait for one to be ready before striking; we should fill the ranks through conscription.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nWe have the capacity to bring more soldiers under the command of the retinues, we need only recruit them.

missions.localised_description: An army without men is hollow like a dead tree, and just as easily toppled.\n\nWe have the capacity to bring more soldiers under the command of the retinues, we need only recruit them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

missions.localised_description: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

missions.localised_description: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

missions.localised_description: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

missions.localised_description: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nWe have taken the neighbouring folk under our wing - with hard work and determination we can achieve much together.

missions.localised_description: China's scale is hard to manage, yet a great leader must, if he is to unite it all.\n\nWe have taken the neighbouring folk under our wing - with hard work and determination we can achieve much together.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

missions.localised_description: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

missions.localised_description: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nThere is room in your court for more cultured, wisened courtiers; please, consider your options.

missions.localised_description: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nThere is room in your court for more cultured, wisened courtiers; please, consider your options.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nWe have received many recommendations for the court from our officials; perhaps it is time to select a candidate?

missions.localised_description: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nWe have received many recommendations for the court from our officials; perhaps it is time to select a candidate?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nThere is an individual whose aptitude could potentially benefit many - you should offer them a position at court.

missions.localised_description: A good leader must have good people around him to advise and to challenge.\n\nThere is an individual whose aptitude could potentially benefit many - you should offer them a position at court.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

missions.localised_description: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

missions.localised_description: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nAn arm without a general is a sword-arm without a hand; worse than nothing. Put strong leaders in charge!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nThere are many different attributes that make a worthy general - do your candidates possesses any of them?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army without a general is a sword arm without a hand; worse than nothing.\n\nBy recruiting an additional general we will have the means to form a new force, should it be needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

missions.localised_description: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nYou may consider putting one of your comrades into a ministerial position; their aid will surely be appreciated.

missions.localised_description: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nYou may consider putting one of your comrades into a ministerial position; their aid will surely be appreciated.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nA ministerial position must be filled - perhaps consider a courtier? Select them according to ability and loyalty.

missions.localised_description: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nA ministerial position must be filled - perhaps consider a courtier? Select them according to ability and loyalty.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nWise counsel is as valuable as a hundred armies or treasures; perhaps there is a suitable candidate at the court?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

missions.localised_description: Ministerial positions are like the great pillars of a majestic palace.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

missions.localised_description: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

missions.localised_description: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An idle court noble is a waste of talent; an abandoned boat in a vast ocean.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

missions.localised_description: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

missions.localised_description: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In China, if habitation is a problem for one, soon it will be for many.\n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In China, if habitation is a problem for one, soon it will be for many.\n\nOne of our provinces languishes from a lack of population. To take from others what we need is an ideal solution!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A military force under full strength is as wasteful as an unploughed field.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

missions.localised_description: A military force under full strength is as wasteful as an unploughed field.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A military force under full strength is as wasteful as an unploughed field.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without a talented administrator, a settlement will fall short of its full promise.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whether to win a war or to preserve peace, there will always be a need for spies.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whether to win a war or to preserve peace, there will always be a need for spies.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whether to win a war or to preserve peace, there will always be a need for spies.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our very heart lies in the hands of another, lowering the morale of our people.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unrest comes only from unhappiness, and means there is rot in the foundations.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unrest comes only from unhappiness, and means there is rot in the foundations.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unrest comes only from unhappiness, and means there is rot in the foundations.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army not at its fullest strength will only perform at a fraction of its potential.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army not at its fullest strength will only perform at a fraction of its potential.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army not at its fullest strength will only perform at a fraction of its potential.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A land without landlords is a tempting vacuum that will be filled sooner or later.\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A land without landlords is a tempting vacuum that will be filled sooner or later.\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A land without landlords is a tempting vacuum that will be filled sooner or later.\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A land without landlords is a tempting vacuum that will be filled sooner or later.\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A land without landlords is a tempting vacuum that will be filled sooner or later.\n\nWe have taken the neighbouring folk under our wing - with hard work and determination we can achieve much together.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is a greater sin to leave an empty seat than to pick a poor candidate by mistake.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is a greater sin to leave an empty seat than to pick a poor candidate by mistake.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is a greater sin to leave an empty seat than to pick a poor candidate by mistake.\n\nThere is room in your court for more cultured, wisened courtiers; please, consider your options.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army cannot function without a general no more than a body can without a head.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army cannot function without a general no more than a body can without a head.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army cannot function without a general no more than a body can without a head.\n\nAn arm without a general is a sword-arm without a hand; worse than nothing. Put strong leaders in charge!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An ministerial position unfulfilled likely means a valuable perspective goes unheard.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without purpose, a person will grow bored, lazy, and susceptible to bad habits.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a crucial difference between a thriving populace and an overcrowded one.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a crucial difference between a thriving populace and an overcrowded one.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a crucial difference between a thriving populace and an overcrowded one.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.
