localised_description.last_approved_text: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

missions.localised_description: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nFielding an additional army will provide extra muscle to help us maintain power and stability.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

missions.localised_description: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nWe can raise more armies and we should, as our enemies will not hold back if they see weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

missions.localised_description: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nThe surest way to victory is through overwhelming odds; raise a powerful force, strong in numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nThese are uncertain times, so if we have capacity for more armies, more should be raised.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Military might does much to advance our cause.\n\nBy fielding more armies we will not have to spread our forces so thinly that they may be ineffective.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Communities are better organised when overseen by civic leaders.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

missions.localised_description: Communities are better organised when overseen by civic leaders.\n\nEntrust control of the commanderies to one who shows willingness and loyalty to the cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Communities are better organised when overseen by civic leaders.\n\nThere are offices that could be filled by willing and loyal servants. Do not leave them vacant.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Communities are better organised when overseen by civic leaders.\n\nThere is room for one to become governor; give power to one your trust, that that may aid in the burden of leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Communities are better organised when overseen by civic leaders.\n\nThis person has a trustworthy character and logical mind, and is recommended for the post of administrator.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

missions.localised_description: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nBy extending our spy network to our allies, we can ensure transparency and even exert control over their affairs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nThere are agents ready to act on our behalf. You should send them to infiltrate the enemy ranks, and sow chaos from within.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nThere is room yet to deploy more spies. The more we deploy, the more we will know and the greater our advantage will be.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nThis discrete, quick-thinking and versatile person would perform admirably as a spy against our neighbours.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clandestine actions of the covert few often dictate the course of history.\n\nBy recruiting a spy, we can impose our will beyond our own borders.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

missions.localised_description: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nIf we stand any chance of reasserting our authority, we must first take back our rightful capital!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

missions.localised_description: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nWe must retake our capital, or else our dreams of conquest are as good as finished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

missions.localised_description: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nWe must reclaim our capital! Without a strong, central city for our people to look to, we will surely wither away…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nThe loss of a capital is a wound that never heals; only by retaking it can we assure our future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without jurisdiction over out capital, our dominion is weak.\n\nEven if it takes dogged patience and perseverance, we must reclaim our lost capital at all costs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

missions.localised_description: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nDefeating the rebels should now be a priority, before disorder spreads throughout the commanderies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

missions.localised_description: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nWhen rebels rise up against you, you must defeat them or fall; such is the will of heaven.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

missions.localised_description: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nThis rebellion cannot be allowed to continue. You must put it down, by whatever means.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The whims of the people do not always favour us.\n\nIt doesn't matter if the people's concerns are just, if rebellion goes unchecked it invites further chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

missions.localised_description: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nFor the military to be prepared for all outcomes, troop numbers should always be at maximum.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

missions.localised_description: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nYour armies need to be bolstered by powerful warriors. You do not want us to fall behind, do you?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nThe sword must be raised in a million hands and sent to battle with a million voices. Raise more forces!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army bereft of numbers will be unprepared for prolonged conflict.\n\nChaos does not wait for one to be ready before striking; we should fill the ranks through conscription.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

missions.localised_description: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nThere is uncolonised territory right next us - now may be the time to expand our authority into those lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

missions.localised_description: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nWe should send forces to occupy these uninhabited regions, with a view to widening our control of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nSend forces into this abandoned region and bathe it in the light of our righteousness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not everywhere is controlled by warlord; certain nearby territories for instance…\n\nThis is a chance for expansion without resistance or casualties; I suggest we occupy the land before someone else does.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Always make space for nobles, for they have the means to bring change.\n\nIf the will of heaven deems an individual worthy to help us with our endeavours, they should be given the chance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Always make space for nobles, for they have the means to bring change.\n\nYou should consider elevating some nobles to your court, to better aid your governance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Aptitude in war requires the accumulation of experience above all.\n\nWe need able generals to uphold our authority, for there is little control over warriors without proper military leadership.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Aptitude in war requires the accumulation of experience above all.\n\nThere is room for another general in the ranks - you should consider promoting a loyal warrior to the position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Aptitude in war requires the accumulation of experience above all.\n\nAn arm without a general is a sword-arm without a hand; worse than nothing. Put strong leaders in charge!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministers provide a leader with valuable perspective resulting in better outcomes for all.\n\nThe ministerial positions should not remain vacant while there are capable individuals humbly waiting to serve.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ministers provide a leader with valuable perspective resulting in better outcomes for all.\n\nA vacant ministerial position is not ideal, especially when there are able and willing individuals ready to fill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

missions.localised_description: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nSend the willing nobles of your court forth to do your bidding, for the good of the commanderies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nYou can assign a duty to one of your court nobles, who otherwise sits idle. Make use of your tools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nYour courtiers are ready for assignments. Consider your options, then make the best use of their talents.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nCharge someone with responsibility and they will rise to the challenge or reveal their shortcomings; both are useful to know.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With their high stations and noteworthy abilities, the nobles must never be at rest.\n\nOn your word, a chosen member of your court can carry out an assigned duty tirelessly, and without question.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

missions.localised_description: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nThe expansion of our most populated settlements should be a priority, so that their continued harmony is ensured.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

missions.localised_description: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nConsider expanding the city - giving the people room to develop and displaying our magnificence to all of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nThis settlement can hold no more people; if we wish the population to grow we must expand its walls.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nWe should avoid letting settlements stagnate; by upgrading them we ensure they can house larger workforces when needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter its industries, a settlement must have people before expansion is feasible.\n\nManpower is sparse in the commandery. This can be addressed with more buildings that will bolster the numbers there.

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter its industries, a settlement must have people before expansion is feasible.\n\nOne of our provinces languishes from a lack of population. To take from others what we need is an ideal solution!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter its industries, a settlement must have people before expansion is feasible.\n\nDevelop your cities in such a way that might benefit the population and make them more likely to settle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nConstructing or improving administration facilities may help us tighten our authority over the commandery.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nThe people here are dissatisfied. Send a force immediately, to quash any seditious thoughts they may have!

missions.localised_description: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nThe people here are dissatisfied. Send a force immediately, to quash any seditious thoughts they may have!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nSometimes, only military might can convince the people of China to remain placid, and docile, for their own benefit.

missions.localised_description: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nSometimes, only military might can convince the people of China to remain placid, and docile, for their own benefit.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nSometimes a show of authority is necessary. It may be wise to station an army nearby to remind the people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unhappiness is a disease that, left to permeate, is extremely difficult to deal with.\n\nFor more harmonious communities, we should construct buildings which improve public order and administration.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A well known rebel and commander has been imprisoned in this province; if we were to capture it, he'd surely join us!

missions.localised_description: A well known rebel and commander has been imprisoned in this province; if we were to capture it, he'd surely join us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It seems that many in this province believe in the words of the Great Teacher, Zhang Jiao. If we were to fly the flag of the Jiazi in their lands, they would surely flock to our side!

missions.localised_description: It seems that many in this province believe in the words of the Great Teacher, Zhang Jiao. If we were to fly the flag of the Jiazi in their lands, they would surely flock to our side!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A message arrives from the Emperor, the Heishan bandits have become a real menace and must be hunted down. He asks that you stop any wars your in and deal with these bandits.

missions.localised_description: A message arrives from the emperor; the Heishan bandits have become a real menace and must be hunted down. He asks that you end any conflicts in which you are involved and deal with them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have Guan Yu's services. However, his conditions remain. He will leave if: You fight liu Bei You lose your capital

missions.localised_description: You have Guan Yu's services. However, his conditions remain - he will leave if you fight Liu Bei and lose your capital.
Success
Success
Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a corruption at the heart of the Tao family which can no longer be tolerated. To avoid betrayal now or in the future, their leader should be confronted and defeated as soon as possible!

missions.localised_description: There is a corruption at the heart of the Tao family which can no longer be tolerated. To avoid betrayal now or in the future, their leader should be confronted and defeated as soon as possible!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Revenge is Schemed Against Old Adversaries

missions.localised_title: Revenge is Schemed Against Old Adversaries

localised_description.last_approved_text: Donghai is a land of plenty; access to the sea and valuable trade routes make it strategically advantageous. In the name of restoring order, it should be ours.

missions.localised_description: Donghai is a land of plenty; access to the sea and valuable trade routes make it strategically advantageous. In the name of restoring order, it should be ours.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It should be the primary concern of all to rescue the emperor from the clutches of tyranny. Yet in securing the imperial seat, one can expect such proximity to power to benefit them greatly…

missions.localised_description: It should be the primary concern of all to rescue the emperor from the clutches of tyranny. Yet in securing the imperial seat, one can expect such proximity to power to benefit them greatly…

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Cunning, the Capital is Saved & Legitimacy Secured

missions.localised_title: Through Cunning, the Capital is Saved & Legitimacy Secured

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although the tyrant razed Luoyang to cinders, the seat of the Han still remains as a beacon of power. The central plains of China pulse with this power - claiming this territory would solidify our position as the Han's true inheritors!

missions.localised_description: Although the tyrant razed Luoyang to cinders, the seat of the Han still remains as a beacon of power. The central plains of China pulse with this power - claiming this territory would solidify our position as the Han's true inheritors!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Imperial Legitimacy is Sought By the Cao

missions.localised_title: Imperial Legitimacy is Sought By the Cao

localised_description.last_approved_text: Alliances - even friendships - are only as durable as the times allow, and these are very fractious times indeed. The Yuan family were stalwart friends once, but there can be no room for companions that will ultimately bring us to ruin…

missions.localised_description: Alliances - even friendships - are only as durable as the times allow, and these are very fractious times indeed. The Yuan family were stalwart friends once, but there can be no room for companions that will ultimately bring us to ruin…

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Falling Star, Old Alliances Crumble

missions.localised_title: A Falling Star, Old Alliances Crumble

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coalition was once ascendant, but is fallen low and useless. Its former power is ours now, but we must have the seat of its former leader - Wei must be ours!

missions.localised_description: The coalition was once ascendant, but is fallen low and useless. Its former power is ours now, but we must have the seat of its former leader - Wei must be ours!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Cao Assume the Coalition's Legacy

missions.localised_title: The Cao Assume the Coalition's Legacy

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people love the Liu family, and the Liu's claim to love them too. The Sun, also, foster the southlands with seeming compassion, but both have far greater aspirations. These desires can be entertained no longer - destroy them both!

missions.localised_description: The people love the Liu family, and the Liu's claim to love them too. The Sun, also, foster the southlands with seeming compassion, but both have far greater aspirations. These desires can be entertained no longer - destroy them both!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Wise Strategy, the Cao Triumph

missions.localised_title: Through Wise Strategy, the Cao Triumph

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is obvious now that, if order is to be truly restored, it must be us that wields the reins of power. We must secure the capitals of China - cities that confer upon us legitimacy, and bring a final, lasting peace to the realm!

missions.localised_description: It is obvious now that, if order is to be truly restored, it must be us that wields the reins of power. We must secure the capitals of China - cities that confer upon us legitimacy, and bring a final, lasting peace to the realm!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Wise Strategy, the Cao Triumph

missions.localised_title: Through Wise Strategy, the Cao Triumph

localised_description.last_approved_text: Treason is a cancer, and we must be the butcher's blade. Every one of those corrupted families - the Sun and the Yuan - must face our blade. Make it painful. All must know the price of treachery!

missions.localised_description: Treason is a cancer, and we must be the butcher's blade. Every one of those corrupted families - the Sun and the Yuan - must face our blade. Make it painful. All must know the price of treachery!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Dong Zhuo Rages Against the Coalition

missions.localised_title: Dong Zhuo Rages Against the Coalition

localised_description.last_approved_text: These traitors defy the will of the emperor - establishing their own 'capitals' and trying to undermine celestial authority. It is treason, then! Seize their cities, and show them the emperor's wrath!

missions.localised_description: These traitors defy the will of the emperor - establishing their own 'capitals' and trying to undermine celestial authority. It is treason, then! Seize their cities, and show them the emperor's wrath!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Dong Zhuo Rages Against the Coalition

missions.localised_title: Dong Zhuo Rages Against the Coalition

localised_description.last_approved_text: The embers of the coalition may dim and the memory of their treason may fade, but there are still those who would raise arms against our righteous rule. There can be no quarter - they must be purged too!

missions.localised_description: The embers of the coalition may dim and the memory of their treason may fade, but there are still those who would raise arms against our righteous rule. There can be no quarter - they must be purged too!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Traitors are Chased by Dong Zhuo

missions.localised_title: The Traitors are Chased by Dong Zhuo

localised_description.last_approved_text: China must come to order, even if war must rage until there are no traitors left to raise a sword against us. Find every hideout of every last deceitful warlord and take them. Leave none alive!

missions.localised_description: China must come to order, even if war must rage until there are no traitors left to raise a sword against us. Find every hideout of every last deceitful warlord and take them. Leave none alive!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Traitors are Chased by Dong Zhuo

missions.localised_title: The Traitors are Chased by Dong Zhuo

localised_description.last_approved_text: Alliances are fickle things, and in times of chaos they seldom last. The legacy of Liu Yu is that of a teacher, but now his students have surpassed him, and must see his family destroyed. Such is life. Such is war.

missions.localised_description: Alliances are fickle things, and in times of chaos they seldom last. The legacy of Liu Yu is that of a teacher, but now his students have surpassed him, and must see his family destroyed. Such is life. Such is war.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Gathering Strength, Gongsun Zan Prepares for War

missions.localised_title: Gathering Strength, Gongsun Zan Prepares for War

localised_description.last_approved_text: We border states are tenacious, but the constant defence against foreign invaders leaves us fragile. We must secure our hold over the other frontier territories, that we might better hold back enemies from beyond the borders.

missions.localised_description: We border states are tenacious, but the constant defence against foreign invaders leaves us fragile. We must secure our hold over the other frontier territories, that we might better hold back enemies from beyond the borders.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Gathering Strength, Gongsun Zan Prepares for War

missions.localised_title: Gathering Strength, Gongsun Zan Prepares for War

localised_description.last_approved_text: The legacy of Yuan Shao will be that of a grand, wealthy man, but one who was ultimately ineffective. All the same, the weight and wealth of his family means toppling their forces will be no easy feat, but they must fall if the north is to be unified under your banner.

missions.localised_description: The legacy of Yuan Shao will be that of a grand, wealthy man, but one who was ultimately ineffective. All the same, the weight and wealth of his family means toppling their forces will be no easy feat, but they must fall if the north is to be unified under your banner.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Coalition Faces a Mighty Enemy in the Gongsun

missions.localised_title: The Coalition Faces a Mighty Enemy in the Gongsun

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coalition failed, allowed to fall by a stagnant leader. However, another, stronger ruler may yet rekindle its spirit. If we conquer Wei, we tell all of China that it is OUR power that will push the tyranny back!

missions.localised_description: The coalition failed, allowed to fall by a stagnant leader. However, another, stronger ruler may yet rekindle its spirit. If we conquer Wei, we tell all of China that it is OUR power that will push the tyranny back!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Gongsun Muster to March on Wei

missions.localised_title: The Gongsun Muster to March on Wei

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cao Cao, and his family, are cunning and ruthless, with the potential to be the biggest threat to our advance. Although defeating them will be difficult, there can be no more pressing matter than their ultimate destruction!

missions.localised_description: Cao Cao, and his family, are cunning and ruthless, with the potential to be the biggest threat to our advance. Although defeating them will be difficult, there can be no more pressing matter than their ultimate destruction!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Gongsun March Upon the Cao

missions.localised_title: The Gongsun March Upon the Cao

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coalition, as that snake Cao Cao would say, must be brought to order. Perhaps we should harness his philosophy, along with his old territory - seize Chen and from there move further into the realm.

missions.localised_description: The coalition, as that snake Cao Cao would say, must be brought to order. Perhaps we should harness his philosophy, along with his old territory - seize Chen and from there move further into the realm.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chen Is Captured as War Continues

missions.localised_title: Chen Is Captured as War Continues

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Liu family have long been friends of ours, and the fury of the Sun dynasty is well known. To ally with them both would be a great boon, as they would be worthy comrades when China finally knows peace and order.

missions.localised_description: The Liu family have long been friends of ours, and the fury of the Sun dynasty is well known. To ally with them both would be a great boon, as they would be worthy comrades when China finally knows peace and order.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Sun & the Gongsun Abandon Avarice

missions.localised_title: The Sun & the Gongsun Abandon Avarice

localised_description.last_approved_text: The seats of great power - Chang'an, Luoyang, Yangzhou… they were all owned by once-great warlords, and they confer such power upon their owners. We should claim them for ourselves, and establish our dynasty as the heavenly-chosen rulers of China!

missions.localised_description: The seats of great power - Chang'an, Luoyang, Yangzhou… they were all owned by once-great warlords, and they confer such power upon their owners. We should claim them for ourselves, and establish our dynasty as the heavenly-chosen rulers of China!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Destiny Carries the Gongsun to Victory

missions.localised_title: Destiny Carries the Gongsun to Victory

localised_description.last_approved_text: We will need strong allies if we are to recover from the Yellow Turban blight. Both the Liu and Gongsun families would be powerful allies - their strength would be advantageous to both us and China as a whole.

missions.localised_description: We will need strong allies if we are to recover from the Yellow Turban blight. Both the Liu and Gongsun families would be powerful allies - their strength would be advantageous to both us and China as a whole.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Kong Rong Forges Alliances with Strong Warlords

missions.localised_title: Kong Rong Forges Alliances with Strong Warlords

localised_description.last_approved_text: We will need strong allies if we are to recover from the Yellow Turban flight. There are many warlords who would aid us - seek out the strong and the trustworthy, and rely on their aid.

missions.localised_description: We will need strong allies if we are to recover from the Yellow Turban flight. There are many warlords who would aid us - seek out the strong and the trustworthy, and rely on their aid.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Kong Rong Forges Alliances with Strong Warlords

missions.localised_title: Kong Rong Forges Alliances with Strong Warlords

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is co-operation - not this endless war - that will lead to China's salvation. Co-operation, friendship and trade will lead to prosperity, so we should prioritise trading with others to secure our future!

missions.localised_description: It is co-operation - not this endless war - that will lead to China's salvation. Co-operation, friendship and trade will lead to prosperity, so we should prioritise trading with others to secure our future!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is co-operation - not this endless war - that will lead to China's salvation. Co-operation, friendship and trade will lead to prosperity, so we should prioritise trading with others to secure our future!

missions.localised_description: It is co-operation - not this endless war - that will lead to China's salvation. Co-operation, friendship and trade will lead to prosperity, so we should prioritise trading with others to secure our future!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are those who would, despite the chaos, continue dragging China into ever-greater peril all in the name of their own ambition and vanity. The Yuan family must fall, and their pompous desires with them!

missions.localised_description: There are those who would, despite the chaos, continue dragging China into ever-greater peril all in the name of their own ambition and vanity. The Yuan family must fall, and their pompous desires with them!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Kong Plan to End the Coalition's Failure

missions.localised_title: The Kong Plan to End the Coalition's Failure

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wei was once owned by Cao Cao, the cunning chancellor. It still holds the trappings of his power, and anyone who claims it would feel the weight of that responsibility.

missions.localised_description: Wei was once owned by Cao Cao, the cunning chancellor. It still holds the trappings of his power, and anyone who claims it would feel the weight of that responsibility.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There were always warlords who looked covetously upon the throne, even before China fell into chaos. The Cao family would claim China if they could - we must not let them! Destroy them all, in the name of peace and sanity!

missions.localised_description: There were always warlords who looked covetously upon the throne, even before China fell into chaos. The Cao family would claim China if they could - we must not let them! Destroy them all, in the name of peace and sanity!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Kong Fight the Cao for Dominance

missions.localised_title: The Kong Fight the Cao for Dominance

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the Han are truly over, and China is to be ruled by a new dynasty, then surely it should be one that values education and peace above all else? These other warlords do not believe that…

missions.localised_description: If the Han are truly over, and China is to be ruled by a new dynasty, then surely it should be one that values education and peace above all else? These other warlords do not believe that…

localised_description.last_approved_text: They say that the Tao family are no friends of our foes - and in times of such strife, that makes them our friends. Confederate with them, and turn their fury against our mutual enemies, for the benefit of us both!

missions.localised_description: They say that the Tao family are no friends of our foes - and in times of such strife, that makes them our friends. Confederate with them, and turn their fury against our mutual enemies, for the benefit of us both!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Liu Bei Seeks Allies in Times of Strife

missions.localised_title: Liu Bei Seeks Allies in Times of Strife

localised_description.last_approved_text: The commandery of Donghai, on the east coast, is rich in resources and trade potential. We can either seize this coastal town for our own benefit or we improve our relations with the owner and confederate or ally with them!

missions.localised_description: The commandery of Donghai, on the east coast, is rich in resources and trade potential. We can either seize this coastal town for our own benefit or we improve our relations with the owner and confederate or ally with them!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Liu Bei Seeks Allies in Times of Strife

missions.localised_title: Liu Bei Seeks Allies in Times of Strife

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lineage of the Liu family runs deep - connected to the Han dynasty itself! Liu Biao has his own ambitions, but they may align with ours. Confederate with him, so we may ride out the tide of war together.

missions.localised_description: The lineage of the Liu family runs deep - connected to the Han dynasty itself! Liu Biao has his own ambitions, but they may align with ours. Confederate with him, so we may ride out the tide of war together.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Seek Allies in Each Other to Fight

missions.localised_title: The Liu Seek Allies in Each Other to Fight

localised_description.last_approved_text: Jade is our most precious resource - it confers both wealth and celestial favour on any who own it. The mines of Xiangyang are rich in it - for the good of our cause, we must seize them!

missions.localised_description: Jade is our most precious resource - it confers both wealth and celestial favour on any who own it. The mines of Xiangyang are rich in it - for the good of our cause, we must seize them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must stop our enemies by any means, even if that means allying with those we would otherwise call our foes. It may be worthwhile to ally with the Sun family, to unify against a common threat.

missions.localised_description: We must stop our enemies by any means, even if that means allying with those we would otherwise call our foes. It may be worthwhile to ally with the Sun family, to unify against a common threat.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Liu Bei Plans to Ally Against Mutual Enemies

missions.localised_title: Liu Bei Plans to Ally Against Mutual Enemies

localised_description.last_approved_text: In these dark times, trust is in short supply. Nevertheless, alliances will be the key to victory, at least in the short-term. Only through co-operation will the people of China finally know peace!

missions.localised_description: In these dark times, trust is in short supply. Nevertheless, alliances will be the key to victory, at least in the short-term. Only through co-operation will the people of China finally know peace!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Pledge to Reunite the Land

missions.localised_title: The Liu Pledge to Reunite the Land

localised_description.last_approved_text: None can be suffered to stand in the way of peace, not even family. Any who oppose our quest to rid China of chaos must be defeated!

missions.localised_description: None can be suffered to stand in the way of peace, not even family. Any who oppose our quest to rid China of chaos must be defeated!

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Rising Star, a Family is Shattered

missions.localised_title: A Rising Star, a Family is Shattered

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chengdu is far from the place we call home, yet is the ancestral home of our distant kin. The people there, too, must know the peace we have fought for here in the east.

missions.localised_description: Chengdu is far from the place we call home, yet is the ancestral home of our distant kin. The people there, too, must know the peace we have fought for here in the east.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They say that Sun Jian fled south, carrying the Imperial Seal. Now, his family intend to start their own dynasty and usurp the Han - this is treason, plain and simple! If such accusations are true, then the Sun must be destroyed!

missions.localised_description: They say that Sun Jian fled south, carrying the Imperial Seal. Now, his family intend to start their own dynasty and usurp the Han - this is treason, plain and simple! If such accusations are true, then the Sun must be destroyed!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Liu Biao Resolves to Defeat Sun Treachery

missions.localised_title: Liu Biao Resolves to Defeat Sun Treachery

localised_description.last_approved_text: The southlands are awash with despots and vagabonds, encroaching north. The Han must be protected - we must take control of these rogue elements and safeguard the realm's security!

missions.localised_description: The southlands are awash with despots and vagabonds, encroaching north. The Han must be protected - we must take control of these rogue elements and safeguard the realm's security!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Liu Biao Determines to Occupy Changsha

missions.localised_title: Liu Biao Determines to Occupy Changsha

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Sun family and the Yuan family are connected. The followers of Yuan Shao are more duplicitous - I am sure none would mind if such noisome warlords were brought to heel. It is simply another enemy who must fall!

missions.localised_description: The Sun family and the Yuan family are connected. The followers of Yuan Shao are more duplicitous - I am sure none would mind if such noisome warlords were brought to heel. It is simply another enemy who must fall!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Pursue the Masters of the Sun

missions.localised_title: The Liu Pursue the Masters of the Sun

localised_description.last_approved_text: The territory of Wei is far from our native lands, but it is a lynchpin in the defence of the realm. We must take control of it, so that the central plains may know stability!

missions.localised_description: The territory of Wei is far from our native lands, but it is a lynchpin in the defence of the realm. We must take control of it, so that the central plains may know stability!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Conspire to Capture Wei

missions.localised_title: The Liu Conspire to Capture Wei

localised_description.last_approved_text: As we grow older, the shadow of death haunts us. We must have strong kin, of our own line, to continue our mission when we are gone. We must confederate with others - family, to ensure our legacy!

missions.localised_description: As we grow older, the shadow of death haunts us. We must have strong kin, of our own line, to continue our mission when we are gone. We must confederate with others - family, to ensure our legacy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We cannot achieve the defence of China alone - we need strong allies and confederates who will aid us in our plight. Find these allies - strong warlords who we can trust to come to our aid!

missions.localised_description: We cannot achieve the defence of China alone - we need strong allies and confederates who will aid us in our plight. Find these allies - strong warlords who we can trust to come to our aid!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Seek Union with Strong Allies

missions.localised_title: The Liu Seek Union with Strong Allies

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Cao family cannot be allowed to realise their dynastic ambitions - they would stand between us and the security of the Han! There is no other way - we must prevail, and the Cao must fall!

missions.localised_description: The Cao family cannot be allowed to realise their dynastic ambitions - they would stand between us and the security of the Han! There is no other way - we must prevail, and the Cao must fall!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Plot the Cao's Destruction

missions.localised_title: The Liu Plot the Cao's Destruction

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chen, the old seat of Cao Cao, carries with it the weight of his name and the legitimacy of his power. If it were to be ours, we would be the inheritors of his will, and all of China would know it!

missions.localised_description: Chen, the old seat of Cao Cao, carries with it the weight of his name and the legitimacy of his power. If it were to be ours, we would be the inheritors of his will, and all of China would know it!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Liu Plot the Conquest of Chen

missions.localised_title: The Liu Plot the Conquest of Chen

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans are a scourge as bad as any beyond the border. Their rebellion must be crushed. It falls to us to wield the blade of their execution.

missions.localised_description: The Yellow Turbans are a scourge as bad as any beyond the border. Their rebellion must be crushed. It falls to us to wield the blade of their execution.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Last Rebel Remnants are Destroyed

missions.localised_title: The Last Rebel Remnants are Destroyed

localised_description.last_approved_text: Consider expanding into the barren steppes around Shuofang. Our position would be strengthened if they were brought under our control.

missions.localised_description: Consider expanding into the barren steppes around Shuofang. Our position would be strengthened if they were brought under our control.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Shuofang beckons as Ma Teng Readies for War

missions.localised_title: Shuofang beckons as Ma Teng Readies for War

localised_description.last_approved_text: Whilst Dong Zhuo's quest to purge the court of corruption may have been noble, it is clear that this continuing conflict lies at his feet. He has gone mad, and must be faced down, and this war ended.

missions.localised_description: Whilst Dong Zhuo's quest to purge the court of corruption may have been noble, it is clear that this continuing conflict lies at his feet. He has gone mad, and must be faced down, and this war ended.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Ma Resist the Tyrant's Influence

missions.localised_title: The Ma Resist the Tyrant's Influence

localised_description.last_approved_text: The seat of Chang'an bestows great prestige and legitimacy upon its owner - if we are to grow in power and reputation, we should claim it for ourselves!

missions.localised_description: The seat of Chang'an bestows great prestige and legitimacy upon its owner - if we are to grow in power and reputation, we should claim it for ourselves!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beyond the remnants of Dong Zhuo's legacy, the central plains are dominated by those who swear fealty to the Cao family. Insidious and crafty, they must be destroyed before their machinations ruin all of China.

missions.localised_description: Beyond the remnants of Dong Zhuo's legacy, the central plains are dominated by those who swear fealty to the Cao family. Insidious and crafty, they must be destroyed before their machinations ruin all of China.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Schemes Against the Cao - Chen Falls

missions.localised_title: Schemes Against the Cao - Chen Falls

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those traitors who defied the emperor made their stand eastwards. Chen was the capital of Cao Cao and his ilk - where he launched his campaigns of treachery. Capture it, and we will prove his revolution was all for nothing!

missions.localised_description: Those traitors who defied the emperor made their stand eastwards. Chen was the capital of Cao Cao and his ilk - where he launched his campaigns of treachery. Capture it, and we will prove his revolution was all for nothing!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chen is Captured, the Ma Advance

missions.localised_title: Chen is Captured, the Ma Advance

localised_description.last_approved_text: The remaining powers - the Liu and Sun dynasties - now hold China between them. We have entered this arena, and it seems wisest to forge alliances with these powers, forging a triumvirate that will hold the stability of China above us all.

missions.localised_description: The remaining powers - the Liu and Sun dynasties - now hold China between them. We have entered this arena, and it seems wisest to forge alliances with these powers, forging a triumvirate that will hold the stability of China above us all.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Ma Plan to Govern China in Alliance

missions.localised_title: The Ma Plan to Govern China in Alliance

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is clear now that China must be brought to peace by forcible means. There can be no sharing of power - warlords will only bicker. We must claim the remaining capitals and bring this chaos to a swift, final end!

missions.localised_description: It is clear now that China must be brought to peace by forcible means. There can be no sharing of power - warlords will only bicker. We must claim the remaining capitals and bring this chaos to a swift, final end!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Central China Falls to the New Ruler

missions.localised_title: Central China Falls to the New Ruler

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our dynasty is forged in fire - chosen by heaven itself! Liu thinks to defy the very heavens?

missions.localised_description: Our dynasty is forged in fire - chosen by heaven itself! Liu thinks to defy the very heavens?

localised_description.last_approved_text: It was in Luoyang where we first heard the call of destiny, and so there we shall begin our quest. By taking the seat of the Han we declare to China that we are staking our claim!

missions.localised_description: It was in Luoyang where we first heard the call of destiny, and so there we shall begin our quest. By taking the seat of the Han we declare to China that we are staking our claim!

localised_description.last_approved_text: If we are to secure the southlands for the Sun, then any warrior standing in our way must be destroyed; warriors like the Liu family, whose fate is already sealed…

missions.localised_description: If we are to secure the southlands for the Sun, then any warrior standing in our way must be destroyed; warriors like the Liu family, whose fate is already sealed…

localised_title.last_approved_text: A Growing Power Unifies the South

missions.localised_title: A Growing Power Unifies the South

localised_description.last_approved_text: For China to know peace, first the Sun must know peace. To that end, the southlands must be secured. In the east, Jianye is rich in lumber and salts. We must claim it, and secure our future!

missions.localised_description: For China to know peace, first the Sun must know peace. To that end, the southlands must be secured. In the east, Jianye is rich in lumber and salts. We must claim it, and secure our future!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Warlord Prepares a New Dynasty

missions.localised_title: The Warlord Prepares a New Dynasty

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is our dream to unify the southlands in our name - to that even, even the furthest reaches of the southwest must be brought under our control; the Shi family must come to understand that truth, too, by whatever means…

missions.localised_description: It is our dream to unify the southlands in our name - to that even, even the furthest reaches of the southwest must be brought under our control; the Shi family must come to understand that truth, too, by whatever means…

localised_description.last_approved_text: For our dynasty to thrive, we must secure the entire southlands. None can stand in the way of that goal - we must seize all the territory of the south, by ANY means!

missions.localised_description: For our dynasty to thrive, we must secure the entire southlands. None can stand in the way of that goal - we must seize all the territory of the south, by ANY means!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Sun Grow in the Southlands

missions.localised_title: The Sun Grow in the Southlands

localised_description.last_approved_text: Power can only be checked by equal, unyielding power. Yet one must prevail - one dynasty must defeat all other claimants to the throne. It must be us - it can only be us.

missions.localised_description: Power can only be checked by equal, unyielding power. Yet one must prevail - one dynasty must defeat all other claimants to the throne. It must be us - it can only be us.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Sun Rise Above the Other Powers

missions.localised_title: The Sun Rise Above the Other Powers

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once the southlands are secured, we must look to bringing a final peace to the realm; the old seats of power must be claimed, and the Sun dynasty must finally rise above the rest!

missions.localised_description: Once the southlands are secured, we must look to bringing a final peace to the realm; the old seats of power must be claimed, and the Sun dynasty must finally rise above the rest!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The family of Han Fu must be destroyed, as all who stand against us must. We can do this work ourselves or have others fight on our behalf. Whatever the method, our enemies must fall!

missions.localised_description: The family of Han Fu must be destroyed, as all who stand against us must. We can do this work ourselves or have others fight on our behalf. Whatever the method, our enemies must fall!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Yuan Shao, Through Wisdom, Defeats Han Fu

missions.localised_title: Yuan Shao, Through Wisdom, Defeats Han Fu

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coalition must survive if this tyranny is to be faced down. Our territory must be strengthened to defend against threats, even if it makes taking some of it by force.

missions.localised_description: The coalition must survive if this tyranny is to be faced down. Our territory must be strengthened to defend against threats, even if it makes taking some of it by force.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is wisdom - especially in times of crisis - in forging unconventional allies that can unite over common ideals. Whilst vassalising the Black Mountain Bandits may be as fleeting as summer rain, it may nonetheless serve a useful purpose…

missions.localised_description: There is wisdom - especially in times of crisis - in forging unconventional allies that can unite over common ideals. Whilst vassalising the Black Mountain Bandits may be as fleeting as summer rain, it may nonetheless serve a useful purpose…

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Bandits Are Placated Near the Black Mountains

missions.localised_title: The Bandits Are Placated Near the Black Mountains

localised_description.last_approved_text: People speak fearfully of the bandits in the mountain, who ride down the slopes and wreak havoc below. Whatever truth there is in these tales, the mountains remain strategically important, and must be claimed.

missions.localised_description: People speak fearfully of the bandits in the mountain, who ride down the slopes and wreak havoc below. Whatever truth there is in these tales, the mountains remain strategically important, and must be claimed.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yuan Seize the Black Mountains

missions.localised_title: The Yuan Seize the Black Mountains

localised_description.last_approved_text: Gongsun Zan and his followers have long lingered and proved a hindrance. If they are allowed to remain, they will continue to be a threat. The time has come to take up arms against this perennial nuisance, and finish them once and for all!

missions.localised_description: Gongsun Zan and his followers have long lingered and proved a hindrance. If they are allowed to remain, they will continue to be a threat. The time has come to take up arms against this perennial nuisance, and finish them once and for all!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Gongsun Zan Fights His Last Battle

missions.localised_title: Gongsun Zan Fights His Last Battle

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even as we face down tyranny in the west, we must remain vigilant for any insurgency from the north. Youbeiping stands against foreign invaders - if brought under our control, the borders would be far more secure.

missions.localised_description: Even as we face down tyranny in the west, we must remain vigilant for any insurgency from the north. Youbeiping stands against foreign invaders - if brought under our control, the borders would be far more secure.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yuan Bolster the Border Territories

missions.localised_title: The Yuan Bolster the Border Territories

localised_description.last_approved_text: The legacy of Cao Cao is ascendant - the trajectory of his family must be halted before they claim all of China for themselves. So, too, the Sun and Liu families, who also make desperate claims to the throne - they must all be destroyed!

missions.localised_description: The legacy of Cao Cao is ascendant - the trajectory of his family must be halted before they claim all of China for themselves. So, too, the Sun and Liu families, who also make desperate claims to the throne - they must all be destroyed!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Remnants of the Coalition are Destroyed

missions.localised_title: The Remnants of the Coalition are Destroyed

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite the tyrant's defeat, the Han still hang on the precipice - weakened, vulnerable. If it must be we who take control, for all of China's sake, then we must dutifully assume this burden.

missions.localised_description: Despite the tyrant's defeat, the Han still hang on the precipice - weakened, vulnerable. If it must be we who take control, for all of China's sake, then we must dutifully assume this burden.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Han are Freed from Old Tyranny

missions.localised_title: The Han are Freed from Old Tyranny

localised_description.last_approved_text: Remnants of rebellion linger, like flies long past the drought. The Yellow Turbans are long past their glory, yet persist all the same. They must be put down, and peace restored, for to let them survive is to invite the wrath of heaven!

missions.localised_description: Remnants of rebellion linger, like flies long past the drought. The Yellow Turbans are long past their glory, yet persist all the same. They must be put down, and peace restored, for to let them survive is to invite the wrath of heaven!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Rebels are Shattered in Battle

missions.localised_title: The Rebels are Shattered in Battle

localised_description.last_approved_text: To the warlord who would be emperor, the southlands present a tempting opportunity. Yangzhou is the heart of the south - rich and prosperous. Claiming it would establish us as the true rulers south of the Yangtze.

missions.localised_description: To the warlord who would be emperor, the southlands present a tempting opportunity. Yangzhou is the heart of the south - rich and prosperous. Claiming it would establish us as the true rulers south of the Yangtze.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Yangzhou Falls After Assault from Yuan Shu

missions.localised_title: Yangzhou Falls After Assault from Yuan Shu

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unity is a hard-won thing, but it must be claimed - even despite protest. We must, in concert with our allies and vassals, move east and defeat those who would stand in the way of peace and harmony.

missions.localised_description: Unity is a hard-won thing, but it must be claimed - even despite protest. We must, in concert with our allies and vassals, move east and defeat those who would stand in the way of peace and harmony.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yuan, With Vassals, Attack the Liu

missions.localised_title: The Yuan, With Vassals, Attack the Liu

localised_description.last_approved_text: The eastern shores are rich in resources and trade opportunities - we must push east and claim them. The stalwart rock may be mighty, but the waves erode all, in time.

missions.localised_description: The eastern shores are rich in resources and trade opportunities - we must push east and claim them. The stalwart rock may be mighty, but the waves erode all, in time.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yuan Head East, Seeking Fortune

missions.localised_title: The Yuan Head East, Seeking Fortune

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cao Cao and his family are cunning ones; they sneak and unfurl like snakes, striking fast and venomous. Their poison must be cut out, and their desires upon China left to slither in the mud.

missions.localised_description: Cao Cao and his family are cunning ones; they sneak and unfurl like snakes, striking fast and venomous. Their poison must be cut out, and their desires upon China left to slither in the mud.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Cao are Defeated Near Chen

missions.localised_title: The Cao are Defeated Near Chen

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have established a solid foothold, but to claim China we must push into its heartlands. Chen, once the seat of mighty warlords, must fall to us. Only then will we establish ourselves as worthy contenders for the throne.

missions.localised_description: We have established a solid foothold, but to claim China we must push into its heartlands. Chen, once the seat of mighty warlords, must fall to us. Only then will we establish ourselves as worthy contenders for the throne.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chen is Besieged by the Yuan

missions.localised_title: Chen is Besieged by the Yuan

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have tolerated Yuan Shao and his followers log enough. You have let them primp and preen and 'lead' the coalition, but no more. They are oafs, standing between you and ultimate victory. Crush them all!

missions.localised_description: You have tolerated Yuan Shao and his followers log enough. You have let them primp and preen and 'lead' the coalition, but no more. They are oafs, standing between you and ultimate victory. Crush them all!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yuan Battle the Yuan Over Wei

missions.localised_title: The Yuan Battle the Yuan Over Wei

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Han are done, and it is time to sweep away the remnants of their rotted past. The lands of the former coalition must now come together under our banner, and swear fealty to our rule!

missions.localised_description: The Han are done, and it is time to sweep away the remnants of their rotted past. The lands of the former coalition must now come together under our banner, and swear fealty to our rule!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Old Dynasty Falls, Another Rises

missions.localised_title: The Old Dynasty Falls, Another Rises

localised_description.last_approved_text: There have been many who have tried to hold back the Heishan Bandits, and all have failed. Now the Yuan family - who claim to control the others - must face our wrath, and know our fury!

missions.localised_description: There have been many who have tried to hold back the Heishan Bandits, and all have failed. Now the Yuan family - who claim to control the others - must face our wrath, and know our fury!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Zhang Yan Descends to Destroy Yuan Shao

missions.localised_title: Zhang Yan Descends to Destroy Yuan Shao

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Black Mountain Bandits do not bow, we do not yield. Those who do soon find themselves at the end of our swords. The commandery of Wei, proud and pompous, represents that attempted control. Take it!

missions.localised_description: The Black Mountain Bandits do not bow, we do not yield. Those who do soon find themselves at the end of our swords. The commandery of Wei, proud and pompous, represents that attempted control. Take it!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Zhang Yan Descends to Conquer Wei

missions.localised_title: Zhang Yan Descends to Conquer Wei

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Gongsun family have long defended against foreign invaders with an admirable zeal. Allying with them would give us strong purchase to continue our expansion into central China.

missions.localised_description: The Gongsun family have long defended against foreign invaders with an admirable zeal. Allying with them would give us strong purchase to continue our expansion into central China.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Black Mountain Bandits Seek Like Minds

missions.localised_title: The Black Mountain Bandits Seek Like Minds

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not all those who serve the Han are fools - there are reliable warlords, who see things differently. We should ally with those who share - or at least tolerate - our ideals, so that we may see prosperity!

missions.localised_description: Not all those who serve the Han are fools - there are reliable warlords, who see things differently. We should ally with those who share - or at least tolerate - our ideals, so that we may see prosperity!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Black Mountain Bandits Seek Like Minds

missions.localised_title: The Black Mountain Bandits Seek Like Minds

localised_description.last_approved_text: Of all the Han warlords, with their ambitions and conceits, it is beyond dispute that Dong Zhuo is the most black-hearted fiend, who must be rooted out from wherever he hides and destroyed!

missions.localised_description: Of all the Han warlords, with their ambitions and conceits, it is beyond dispute that Dong Zhuo is the most black-hearted fiend, who must be rooted out from wherever he hides and destroyed!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Bandits Ride Against the Tyrant

missions.localised_title: The Bandits Ride Against the Tyrant

localised_description.last_approved_text: Of all the fools that call themselves warlords, the tyrant was perhaps the most foolish of all. His capital, Chang'an, however, is a ripe fruit, ready to be plucked.

missions.localised_description: Of all the fools that call themselves warlords, the tyrant was perhaps the most foolish of all. His capital, Chang'an, however, is a ripe fruit, ready to be plucked.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Of them all, the Cao family sit above the rest as the most pernicious and deceitful. Their treason, masquerading as pragmatism, is unacceptable and we cannot have it. They must fall like all the rest, sooner or later.

missions.localised_description: Of them all, the Cao family sit above the rest as the most pernicious and deceitful. Their treason, masquerading as pragmatism, is unacceptable and we cannot have it. They must fall like all the rest, sooner or later.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Black Mountain Bandits Conspire to Destroy Cao Cao

missions.localised_title: The Black Mountain Bandits Conspire to Destroy Cao Cao

localised_description.last_approved_text: Old and cunning Cao Cao would never tolerate the capture of his capital, Chen, but if it lies ready to be taken, we Black Mountain Bandits will not hesitate a moment.

missions.localised_description: Old and cunning Cao Cao would never tolerate the capture of his capital, Chen, but if it lies ready to be taken, we Black Mountain Bandits will not hesitate a moment.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Black Mountain Bandits Conquer Chen

missions.localised_title: The Black Mountain Bandits Conquer Chen

localised_description.last_approved_text: High in the mountains, the Heishan Bandits claim to be rebels, but their allegiance to the Han is well known. Their claim to banditry is an insult, so they must face the blade for their insolence!

missions.localised_description: High in the mountains, the Heishan Bandits claim to be rebels, but their allegiance to the Han is well known. Their claim to banditry is an insult, so they must face the blade for their insolence!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Two Bandits Fight in the Mountains' Shadow

missions.localised_title: Two Bandits Fight in the Mountains' Shadow

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people fear the bandits descending from the mountain, pillaging and raiding the valleys below. Once we claim their old strongholds, however, they will know the true meaning of fear.

missions.localised_description: The people fear the bandits descending from the mountain, pillaging and raiding the valleys below. Once we claim their old strongholds, however, they will know the true meaning of fear.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These decadent, naive warlords bicker over the scraps of the Han - they are all as guilty as one another. The Yuan claim to 'lead' coalitions to keep the peace, but they are nothing but power-hungry fools, deserving of the axe.

missions.localised_description: These decadent, naive warlords bicker over the scraps of the Han - they are all as guilty as one another. The Yuan claim to 'lead' coalitions to keep the peace, but they are nothing but power-hungry fools, deserving of the axe.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Bandits Ride on the Yuan

missions.localised_title: The Bandits Ride on the Yuan

localised_description.last_approved_text: The decadent warlords of the Han are a dying breed, and we are their executioners. We should take Wei, one of the capitals of the old 'coalition', and rip another limb from these contemptible fools.

missions.localised_description: The decadent warlords of the Han are a dying breed, and we are their executioners. We should take Wei, one of the capitals of the old 'coalition', and rip another limb from these contemptible fools.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Bandit Horde Sweeps Through Wei

missions.localised_title: The Bandit Horde Sweeps Through Wei

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Han, despite their 'best' efforts, are finished. Their house is rotted through. All it requires is one powerful blow to finish it off; one kick, and the whole corrupt structure will come tumbling down.

missions.localised_description: The Han, despite their 'best' efforts, are finished. Their house is rotted through. All it requires is one powerful blow to finish it off; one kick, and the whole corrupt structure will come tumbling down.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Hated Han are Finally Torn Down

missions.localised_title: The Hated Han are Finally Torn Down

localised_description.last_approved_text: Luoyang, the now-ruined husk of a capital, represents the death of the Han and the potential for something new. We are that something. Take their capital - behead the beast!

missions.localised_description: Luoyang, the now-ruined husk of a capital, represents the death of the Han and the potential for something new. We are that something. Take their capital - behead the beast!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Old Capital Falls to the Bandits

missions.localised_title: The Old Capital Falls to the Bandits

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nothing can be left of this corrupted mess - not the Han, and not the branches they left festering in the dirt. Root out the remains of the Liu dynasty and crush them too. Leave nothing.

missions.localised_description: Nothing can be left of this corrupted mess - not the Han, and not the branches they left festering in the dirt. Root out the remains of the Liu dynasty and crush them too. Leave nothing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These warlords persist, like vermin across China, and you cannot know peace until they are all rooted out and destroyed - every last one. We shall seize their capitals, and finally bring it all crumbling down.

missions.localised_description: These warlords persist, like vermin across China, and you cannot know peace until they are all rooted out and destroyed - every last one. We shall seize their capitals, and finally bring it all crumbling down.
Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

missions.localised_description: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

missions.localised_title: From Each According to Their Ability

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are safe for now, Lord Cao Cao - but we cannot rest! The time has come to expand your rule; the nearby farmland is an opportunity waiting to be seized and a chance to push back against those in thrall to Dong Zhuo!

missions.localised_description: You are safe for now, Lord Cao Cao - but we cannot rest! The time has come to expand your rule; the nearby farmland is an opportunity waiting to be seized and a chance to push back against those in thrall to Dong Zhuo!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Banner of War is Raised & Cao Cao Marches!

missions.localised_title: The Banner of War is Raised & Cao Cao Marches!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Although you have your eyes on the future, my lord, do not forget that you must remain strong both at home, as well as in the field. Our home infrastructure can be developed; rich farmland and fertile plains should be nurtured - doing so can only aid us.

missions.localised_description: Although you have your eyes on the future, my lord, do not forget that you must remain strong both at home, as well as in the field. Our home infrastructure can be developed; rich farmland and fertile plains should be nurtured - doing so can only aid us.

missions.localised_title: Cao Cao Administrates Firmly, But Fairly

localised_description.last_approved_text: The coalition is finished, and the tyranny of Dong Zhuo endures, despite your intentions. The time has now come to look to other plans. Although you have returned home, there is little time to waste - the tyrant has sent Han forces to apprehend you; they must be defeated before we can look to our future!

In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_title.last_approved_text: From Each According to Their Ability

missions.localised_title: From Each According to Their Ability

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is clear that, although he is now mercifully gone, Dong Zhuo was a symptom of China's ills, not the cause. Other petty warriors throughout China still plot avariciously - perhaps they always did. You cannot allow them to hold the country in thrall. It is time to increase your prestige amongst the other nobles. Through your economic wisdom, and gifted statecraft and strategy, you can - and should - make yourself known!

missions.localised_description: It is clear that, although he is now mercifully gone, Dong Zhuo was a symptom of China's ills, not the cause. Other petty warriors throughout China still plot avariciously - perhaps they always did. You cannot allow them to hold the country in thrall. It is time to increase your prestige amongst the other nobles. Through your economic wisdom, and gifted statecraft and strategy, you can - and should - make yourself known!

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To progress through the ranks, you must gain {{tr:faction_progression_prestige}} by growing your territory - to do so, construct buildings, enact reforms, and conquer territory![[/i]]

missions.localised_title: Cao Cao Seeks to Improve His Standing

localised_description.last_approved_text: Word of your efforts has spread, and there are now many who admire your ambition, believing you to be the one who with the strength and drive to reunite China. They are willing to put their faith in your leadership and offer their talents in your service. - it is time for you to start recruiting warriors for the long battle ahead.

missions.localised_description: Word of your efforts has spread, and there are now many who admire your ambition, believing you to be the one who with the strength and drive to reunite China. They are willing to put their faith in your leadership and offer their talents in your service. - it is time for you to start recruiting warriors for the long battle ahead.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]Recruit units to your armies! Left-click on an army and select the 'recruit' button, then choose the units you wish to muster. You must maintain the units until the start of your next turn.[[/i]]

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your initial advances were promising, my lord, but bolder steps are required. You must take control of the entire commandery. By doing so, you will solidify a central position that allows you to administrate and strategise more effectively. From such a position, you can then more easily expand your influence - and fight any other warlords in your way.

Yet so long as they remain there is work left for you to do. March out at once and see that they regret the day they ever raised a sword against you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So long as there are enemies of the empire, there will be a need to combat them. To that end, more men must be recruited, to fight the wars you lead. Muster the strength of the empire's willing people, and see to the traitors who stand brazenly in defiance of the emperor's heavenly will!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tyrant is dead, and someone must step into the vacuum he has left. With respect, my lord, if you are to be taken seriously by the nobles of China, you must increase your standing. By whatever means necessary - warfare, diplomacy, shrewd economising - you must prove yourself influential and worthy of their respect.

missions.localised_description: The tyrant is dead, and someone must step into the vacuum he has left. With respect, my lord, if you are to be taken seriously by the nobles of China, you must increase your standing. By whatever means necessary - warfare, diplomacy, shrewd economising - you must prove yourself influential and worthy of their respect.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The rebel army is defeated, my lord, but their stronghold yet remains. The county, and commandery, must know peace - to that end, you must march on the Yellow Turban hideout and liberate it from their insurgent grip!

missions.localised_description: The rebel army is defeated, my lord, but their stronghold yet remains. The county, and commandery, must know peace - to that end, you must march on the Yellow Turban hideout and liberate it from their insurgent grip!
