localised_title.last_approved_text: Kong Rong Roots Out the Yellow Turban Rebellion

missions.localised_title: Kong Rong Roots Out the Yellow Turban Rebellion

localised_description.last_approved_text: The key to bettering your people is by bettering their homes. A stronger infrastructure allows for a stronger economy and greater opportunity for your citizens. Develop your lands - commercial buildings, agriculture, even military establishments, and let the people thrive!

missions.localised_description: The key to bettering your people is by bettering their homes. A stronger infrastructure allows for a stronger economy and greater opportunity for your citizens. Develop your lands - commercial buildings, agriculture, even military establishments, and let the people thrive!

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To construct a building, left-click on a settlement and select a building slot. Then, left-click on the desired building.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]To construct a building, left-click on a settlement and select a building slot. Then, left-click on the desired building.[[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: At Home, Kong Rong Seeks to Help the People

missions.localised_title: At Home, Kong Rong Seeks to Help the People

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite all our efforts, the Han is collapsing, and in its wake you are beset by a resurgence of the Yellow Turban menace! If you are to restore peace, and foster the knowledge for which you are known, these insurgents must be put down - by force!

missions.localised_description: Despite all our efforts, the Han is collapsing, and in its wake you are beset by a resurgence of the Yellow Turban menace! If you are to restore peace, and foster the knowledge for which you are known, these insurgents must be put down - by force!

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]Engage the enemy army! Left-click to select your army, then right-click on the enemy force to initiate a battle![[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]Engage the enemy army! Left-click to select your army, then right-click on the enemy force to initiate a battle![[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: War Comes for Kong Rong, Who Reluctantly Fights

missions.localised_title: War Comes for Kong Rong, Who Reluctantly Fights

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

missions.localised_description: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To manage your assignments, select a settlement and then select the 'assignments' button on the left of the panel.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]To manage your assignments, select a settlement and then select the 'assignments' button on the left of the panel.[[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: From Each According to Their Ability

missions.localised_title: From Each According to Their Ability

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the tyrant dead, it is time to look to greater things, my lord! The only way you can properly spread your message of knowledge and understanding is by taking stock of the wider world.

missions.localised_description: With the tyrant dead, it is time to look to greater things, my lord! The only way you can properly spread your message of knowledge and understanding is by taking stock of the wider world.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To progress through the ranks, you must gain {{tr:faction_progression_prestige}} by growing your territory - to do so, construct buildings, enact reforms, and conquer territory![[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]To progress through the ranks, you must gain {{tr:faction_progression_prestige}} by growing your territory - to do so, construct buildings, enact reforms, and conquer territory![[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: Kong Rong Seeks to Make Himself Known

missions.localised_title: Kong Rong Seeks to Make Himself Known

localised_description.last_approved_text: So long as the tyrant still lives, Kong Rong, your message of knowledge and understanding will continue to be stifled! As such, you must take stock of the wider world. By increasing your influence and prestige amongst both the high-born and the low, your message will reach many more people, and be understood far and wide, and you will gain the strength to confront the tyrant of ignorance!

missions.localised_description: So long as the tyrant still lives, Kong Rong, your message of knowledge and understanding will continue to be stifled! As such, you must take stock of the wider world. By increasing your influence and prestige amongst both the high-born and the low, your message will reach many more people, and be understood far and wide, and you will gain the strength to confront the tyrant of ignorance!

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To progress through the ranks, you must gain {{tr:faction_progression_prestige}} by growing your territory - to do so, construct buildings, enact reforms, and conquer territory![[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: Kong Rong Seeks to Make Himself Known

missions.localised_title: Kong Rong Seeks to Make Himself Known

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no way around it - war is unavoidable. Sometimes, you must fight to preserve peace in the long run. You must muster units for the conflict - for if you are to foster greater knowledge and harmony in China, you must be able to defend yourself against those who would snuff the flame of wisdom out.

missions.localised_description: There is no way around it - war is unavoidable. Sometimes, you must fight to preserve peace in the long run. You must muster units for the conflict - for if you are to foster greater knowledge and harmony in China, you must be able to defend yourself against those who would snuff the flame of wisdom out.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]Recruit units to your armies! Left-click on an army and select the 'recruit' button, then choose the units you wish to muster. You must maintain the units until the start of your next turn.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]Recruit units to your armies! Left-click on an army and select the 'recruit' button, then choose the units you wish to muster. You must maintain the units until the start of your next turn.[[/i]]

localised_title.last_approved_text: Battle Must Be Joined & Men Must Fight

missions.localised_title: Battle Must Be Joined & Men Must Fight

localised_description.last_approved_text: The surrounding area must be stabilised before you can begin to spread your wisdom and peace once more, my lord. You must capture more territory, and bring rationality and calm to a land that is being torn apart by the ceaseless ravages of civil war!

missions.localised_description: The surrounding area must be stabilised before you can begin to spread your wisdom and peace once more, my lord. You must capture more territory, and bring rationality and calm to a land that is being torn apart by the ceaseless ravages of civil war!

In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Restoring the Han will take all of your strength, Liu Bei! You must crush the local Yellow Turban stronghold, seize it for yourself, and bring peace and justice back to the people; only then you can focus on greater matters!

localised_description.last_approved_text: At war, we must be relentless, but at home we must be diligent. In our recently acquired territory, we should upgrade the infrastructure and in turn bolster our treasury. The coin will be put to good use in our future endeavours, and give good people honest work.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empire of your lineage hangs in the balance – you must stand to defend it! Whilst there are avaricious warlords looking to profit from the empire's fall, your first priority must be to deal with the perennial nuisance of the Yellow Turbans...

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are descended of imperial blood, Liu Bei, and the other nobles of China must understand that, especially now that the tyrant is dead. Through your actions in diplomacy, economics and also, inevitably, war, you will need to demonstrate your prestige and influence - only then will they see you as a legitimate defender of the empire.

missions.localised_description: You are descended of imperial blood, Liu Bei, and the other nobles of China must understand that, especially now that the tyrant is dead. Through your actions in diplomacy, economics and also, inevitably, war, you will need to demonstrate your prestige and influence - only then will they see you as a legitimate defender of the empire.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]To progress through the ranks, you must gain {{tr:faction_progression_prestige}} by growing your territory - to do so, construct buildings, enact reforms, and conquer territory![[/i]]

missions.localised_title: Liu Bei Seeks to Make Himself Known

localised_description.last_approved_text: If we are to face down Dong Zhuo and end the tyranny blighting China, then our prestige amongst the other nobles must increase. You are descended of imperial blood, Liu Bei, and the other nobles of China must understand that. Through your economic wisdom, and gifted statecraft and strategy, you can - and should - make yourself known!

missions.localised_description: If we are to face down Dong Zhuo and end the tyranny blighting China, then our prestige amongst the other nobles must increase. You are descended of imperial blood, Liu Bei, and the other nobles of China must understand that. Through your economic wisdom, and gifted statecraft and strategy, you can - and should - make yourself known!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is time - war looms like a pregnant storm cloud, and the rain must soon fall. Forces must be gathered; send out the mustering call and grow your armies - only when the people have answered your cry can you march to war with the voice of China at your back!

missions.localised_description: It is time - war looms like a pregnant storm cloud, and the rain must soon fall. Forces must be gathered; send out the mustering call and grow your armies - only when the people have answered your cry can you march to war with the voice of China at your back!

localised_title.last_approved_text: With a Rallying Cry, Liu Bei Draws More to His Cause

missions.localised_title: With a Rallying Cry, Liu Bei Draws More to His Cause

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have spent time defending yourself and claiming victories where you could find them, my lord, but now you must move to seize a base of power. Before you can move to truly defend the Han, you must secure your own borders. You must have an administrative hub under your command, to establish law and peace and build strength, before you are to look in earnest to those rising against your kin.

missions.localised_description: You have spent time defending yourself and claiming victories where you could find them, my lord, but now you must move to seize a base of power. Before you can move to truly defend the Han, you must secure your own borders. You must have an administrative hub under your command, to establish law and peace and build strength, before you are to look in earnest to those rising against your kin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the tyrant falls, it is clear that there is now space in China for a new leader to rise. You have long been known for your steadfast, if local, rule, but the time has come to rise above your station and be more. Through your statecraft, your economic endeavours, and even through war, you must make your name known across the land as someone capable of guiding the empire through these tumultuous times.

missions.localised_description: As the tyrant falls, it is clear that there is now space in China for a new leader to rise. You have long been known for your steadfast, if local, rule, but the time has come to rise above your station and be more. Through your statecraft, your economic endeavours, and even through war, you must make your name known across the land as someone capable of guiding the empire through these tumultuous times.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

missions.localised_title: From Each According to Their Ability

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is clear that, even with the death of the tyrant, China is falling ever further into chaos, and the only way to combat the rising madness is to solidify your own claim on the realm's future. Although the Han must be protected, it is clear they cannot do it alone. By increasing your rank, you show the world that you are the empire's defender!

missions.localised_description: It is clear that, even with the death of the tyrant, China is falling ever further into chaos, and the only way to combat the rising madness is to solidify your own claim on the realm's future. Although the Han must be protected, it is clear they cannot do it alone. By increasing your rank, you show the world that you are the empire's defender!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A strengthened economy has one, immediate benefit: you can muster and sustain more troops for the ongoing war effort. Without troops, you cannot defend China, and so you must have more. You must see to recruitment, immediately!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Unity will bring China back towards order, and that means you must capture the entire commandery. Only once the entire area is under your control can you bring stability, and begin looking towards the future and what to do about Dong Zhuo…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tyrant is dead, my lord, and destiny is calling you - it is time to answer! You are famed for your skill in battle, but the hour of recognition is upon you. Strike out, and through your words, your deeds and - yes - your blade, make your name known from the highest mountain to the deepest sea!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Destiny calls, Sun Jian - the tyrant must fall, and you can be the one to defeat him! You are known as a fierce warrior; it is now time to ensure all of China knows of your might! Strike out, and through your words, your deeds and - yes - your blade, make your name known from the highest mountain to the deepest sea!

localised_description.last_approved_text: South of the Yangtze lies vast, fertile territory for the taking. Yet Liu Biao also continues to prowl nearby - conflict with him and his vassals may be inevitable. So to the north or the south lie opportunities for expansion. Yet it would be wise to choose only one. The choice is yours...

localised_description.last_approved_text: Dong Zhuo is dead, my lord, and someone must now assume the reins of stability! Your name is already well-known, Yuan Shao, but it is time you began to cement your legacy. Through prudent statecraft, economic growth and decisive war-making, you will make yourself known as a leader worthy of respect and obedience.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are well-versed in war, my lady, and China is on the brink of total chaos. Only strength on the battlefield will decide a victor, and it must be you. Increase recruitment to your armies, then ride into battle and destroy all opposition!

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Han crumbles, more and more of their territory lies vulnerable, and you must not let the opportunity for power slip through your fingers, Zheng Jiang. The entire commandery is within your grasp - simply reach out and take it!

missions.localised_description: As the Han crumbles, more and more of their territory lies vulnerable, and you must not let the opportunity for power slip through your fingers, Zheng Jiang. The entire commandery is within your grasp - simply reach out and take it!

localised_title.last_approved_text: China Lies Vulnerable - Zheng Jiang Will Exploit This

missions.localised_title: China Lies Vulnerable - Zheng Jiang Will Exploit This

missions.localised_description: Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite your best intentions, it is clear that the time of the Han is ending; the only question is with the empire falling, who then will rule China? Whilst other warlords stake their claim, making brazen moves for territory, they cannot be trusted to wield power - but you can. Perhaps [[b]]only[[/b]] you ever could. It is time to rise above these squabbles and become something greater - a warlord worthy of following!

missions.localised_description: Despite your best intentions, it is clear that the time of the Han is ending; the only question is with the empire falling, who then will rule China? Whilst other warlords stake their claim, making brazen moves for territory, they cannot be trusted to wield power - but you can. Perhaps [[b]]only[[/b]] you ever could. It is time to rise above these squabbles and become something greater - a warlord worthy of following!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are the empire's only hope of restoring order and authority. Through force and intimidation, you need to crush the rebellion and restore imperial control!

missions.localised_description: You are the empire's only hope of restoring order and authority. Through force and intimidation, you need to crush the rebellion and restore imperial control!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are charged with defeating the evil that is consuming the land. Seek wisdom in the teachings of the Way to purge this evil with military might.

missions.localised_description: You are charged with defeating the evil that is consuming the land. Seek wisdom in the teachings of the Way to purge this evil with military might.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Long has your military prowess kept peace in the north and protected the empire's borders. Now you must extend your power and influence to unify the rest of China, and free it from tyranny.\n\n

missions.localised_description: Long has your military prowess kept peace in the north and protected the empire's borders. Now you must extend your power and influence to unify the rest of China, and free it from tyranny.\n\n

localised_description.last_approved_text: The teachings of Zhang Jue live through you. The mandate of the Han is truly lost; the only answer to this troubled time surely lies in the teachings of the Way.

missions.localised_description: The teachings of Zhang Jue live through you. The mandate of the Han is truly lost; the only answer to this troubled time surely lies in the teachings of the Way.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You must cleanse the empire of the corruption corroding it. Use the clarity of the teachings of the Way to lead the rebellion, and see the Yellow Sky rise!

missions.localised_description: You must cleanse the empire of the corruption corroding it. Use the clarity of the teachings of the Way to lead the rebellion, and see the Yellow Sky rise!

localised_description.last_approved_text: While China is engulfed in conflict, your interests remain with the security and future of the people. Education, learning, and economics are your chosen tools - wield them effectively to bring peace!

missions.localised_description: While China is engulfed in conflict, your interests remain with the security and future of the people. Education, learning, and economics are your chosen tools - wield them effectively to bring peace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people of China need you! Through your virtue and conviction you have forged unfailing bonds with your followers and the people. Continue on this quest, spread your influence, and give the people the peace they desperately need by bringing an end to the tyranny plaguing the land.

missions.localised_description: The people of China need you! Through your virtue and conviction you have forged unfailing bonds with your followers and the people. Continue on this quest, spread your influence, and give the people the peace they desperately need by bringing an end to the tyranny plaguing the land.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the empire crumbles, you are the beacon that upholds its values and its spirit. Consolidate and grow your power to maintain order and peace!

missions.localised_description: As the empire crumbles, you are the beacon that upholds its values and its spirit. Consolidate and grow your power to maintain order and peace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are one of the last remaining loyal defenders of the Han. In this chaos, you must establish your power to serve and to protect the empire.

missions.localised_description: You are one of the last remaining loyal defenders of the Han. In this chaos, you must establish your power to serve and to protect the empire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time to prove yourself has come. From humble beginnings, you have risen up, seeking every opportunity to seize glory! Continue on this path to bring peace to the land, end the tyranny, and prove yourself worthy!

missions.localised_description: The time to prove yourself has come. From humble beginnings, you have risen up, seeking every opportunity to seize glory! Continue on this path to bring peace to the land, end the tyranny, and prove yourself worthy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are chosen to act as China's preeminent commander, to secure the empire, and combat the rising tyranny. Increase your power, so that you might end this conflict, and restore the Han.

missions.localised_description: You are chosen to act as China's preeminent commander, to secure the empire, and combat the rising tyranny. Increase your power, so that you might end this conflict, and restore the Han.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While false pretenders controls the power within the empire, you know it should be [[b]]you[[/b]] who wields that power instead. Prove your claim by establishing your power, and seizing opportunity in an empire of chaos.

missions.localised_description: While false pretenders controls the power within the empire, you know it should be [[b]]you[[/b]] who wields that power instead. Prove your claim by establishing your power, and seizing opportunity in an empire of chaos.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You While others may lament the fall of the Han, you see opportunity. No matter the cost, you will find your way to greatness. Establish your power and influence, then forge your destiny in the turmoil.

missions.localised_description: You While others may lament the fall of the Han, you see opportunity. No matter the cost, you will find your way to greatness. Establish your power and influence, then forge your destiny in the turmoil.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time for a new order has come! As empires and dynasties crumbles, you forge your plans of conquest and subjugation. Go forth to seize your fortune and your rightful place!

missions.localised_description: The time for a new order has come! As empires and dynasties crumbles, you forge your plans of conquest and subjugation. Go forth to seize your fortune and your rightful place!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The days of the empire are over, and the emperor is losing his mandate. It is you who can restore order to this land and who can bring peace to its people. But you must be brave enough to step up, and capture the seat of an emperor.

missions.localised_description: The days of the empire are over, and the emperor is losing his mandate. It is you who can restore order to this land and who can bring peace to its people. But you must be brave enough to step up, and capture the seat of an emperor.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor has lost his mandate, and the land is suffering for it. Your influence has grown, however, and the number of your followers is many. Now prove your claim, and your right to rule, and proclaim yourself as new emperor of China.

missions.localised_description: The emperor has lost his mandate, and the land is suffering for it. Your influence has grown, however, and the number of your followers is many. Now prove your claim, and your right to rule, and proclaim yourself as new emperor of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empire has fallen, and the days of the Han are over. A new age is dawning, and the moment is yours. Seize this opportunity, claim the mandate, and proclaim yourself as a new ruler suitable for the future.

missions.localised_description: The empire has fallen, and the days of the Han are over. A new age is dawning, and the moment is yours. Seize this opportunity, claim the mandate, and proclaim yourself as a new ruler suitable for the future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The kindling flame of the rebellion is burning ever higher. The corruption is fading from the land, and the mandate is shifting. End this conflict by establishing a new rule and a new dynasty in the name of the Way.

missions.localised_description: The kindling flame of the rebellion is burning ever higher. The corruption is fading from the land, and the mandate is shifting. End this conflict by establishing a new rule and a new dynasty in the name of the Way.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your mandate is righteous, but other petty warlords and kings have proclaimed themselves as false emperors in an attempt to threaten your rule. Unite what is divided, and overthrow these pretenders by capturing their seats of power. You must unite China under your rule!

missions.localised_description: Your mandate is righteous, but other petty warlords and kings have proclaimed themselves as false emperors in an attempt to threaten your rule. Unite what is divided, and overthrow these pretenders by capturing their seats of power. You must unite China under your rule!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your mandate is righteous, and a new dynasty for China has emerged. Yet other petty warlords have proclaimed themselves as false emperors in an attempt to claim your rule illegitimate. End these pretenders, and unite China under your rightful mandate.

missions.localised_description: Your mandate is righteous, and a new dynasty for China has emerged. Yet other petty warlords have proclaimed themselves as false emperors in an attempt to claim your rule illegitimate. End these pretenders, and unite China under your rightful mandate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the sky turns yellow, a new dynasty emerges to bring peace to China. Other pretenders have risen and cling on to the old ways of the Han. Purge these false emperors, and unite China under the mandate of the yellow sky.

missions.localised_description: As the sky turns yellow, a new dynasty emerges to bring peace to China. Other pretenders have risen and cling on to the old ways of the Han. Purge these false emperors, and unite China under the mandate of the yellow sky.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even though you have unified all of China's seats of power and thus illustrated your mandate, there are still lands and regions left who have nominal independence. Even though it is only a matter of time that these lands fall under your control, you may accelerate this unification by conquest.

missions.localised_description: Even though you have unified all of China's seats of power and thus illustrated your mandate, there are still lands and regions left who have nominal independence. Even though it is only a matter of time that these lands fall under your control, you may accelerate this unification by conquest.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our allies say we should capture an enemy region to lower their power.

missions.localised_description: Our allies say we should capture an enemy region to lower their power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our ally's lands are being assaulted, they have requested our aid.

missions.localised_description: Our ally's lands are being assaulted, they have requested our aid.

missions.localised_description: Our allies say we should defeat this army.

missions.localised_description: Our alliance suggests we capture this region and give it to this faction.

missions.localised_description: Our allies say we should sack an enemy region to lower their morale.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Peacetime is a resource that should not be wasted on inaction.\n\nOur neighbours grow bold and our soldiers restless. A show of strength would cement our power.

missions.localised_description: Peacetime is a resource that should not be wasted on inaction.\n\nOur neighbours grow bold and our soldiers restless. A show of strength would cement our power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

missions.localised_description: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nPerhaps we should consider peace? Anger is no way to lead a nation, nor keep people in line.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A single enemy, no matter how small, can be a powerful foe.\n\nPerhaps it would be wise to broker peace now, before conflict becomes unavoidable?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Two conflicts is two too many.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Trade with another is the cornerstone of economic prosperity for both.\n\nTrade opportunities should be sought beyond our borders, for the advancement of our great cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Trade with another is the cornerstone of economic prosperity for both.\n\nThere may be wisdom in establishing trade agreements with others, so we may grow ever more prosperous!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The unknown motives of trespassers can cause unease and instability.\n\nThere can be no quarter for trespassers. Though we have not quarrelled before, we must not hesitate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who render homage are occasionally contented under an overlord’s rule.\n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shackles of poverty can soon become detrimental to the great cause.\n\nIf our lands do not provide all that we need, maybe trade with others can bolster their shortcomings?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A stable authority is always better assured with a boost in its income.\n\n Our coffers are healthy, but we could strengthen them by forging new trade relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Overcrowding can be like a sickness, gradually weakening a settlement until its demise.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without an adequate workforce, all the infrastructure in the world will achieve nothing.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

missions.localised_description: The people strain against the confines of our lands.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: In China, if habitation is a problem for one, soon it will be for many.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

missions.localised_description: In China, if habitation is a problem for one, soon it will be for many.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The drums of war have stopped beating; words of all can be heard clearer.\n\nOur neighbours grow bold and our soldiers restless. A show of strength would cement our power.

missions.localised_description: The drums of war have stopped beating; words of all can be heard clearer.\n\nOur neighbours grow bold and our soldiers restless. A show of strength would cement our power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

missions.localised_description: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nPerhaps we should consider peace? Anger is no way to lead a nation, nor keep people in line.

missions.localised_description: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nPerhaps we should consider peace? Anger is no way to lead a nation, nor keep people in line.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nPerhaps it would be wise to broker peace now, before conflict becomes unavoidable?

missions.localised_description: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nPerhaps it would be wise to broker peace now, before conflict becomes unavoidable?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

missions.localised_description: Conflict is inescapable, but it does not mean that war is the world's natural state.\n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

missions.localised_description: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nWar on such a scale is unsustainable. May I suggest we try to make our way towards peace?

missions.localised_description: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nWar on such a scale is unsustainable. May I suggest we try to make our way towards peace?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nIt may be prudent to offer peace now, to avoid being forced into a weakened position later.

missions.localised_description: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nIt may be prudent to offer peace now, to avoid being forced into a weakened position later.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

missions.localised_description: A war on two fronts is to be avoided unless absolutely necessary.\n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

missions.localised_description: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nIf we are to ensure the longevity of our rule, we should strive to make peace with our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nPeace must always be the solution, so in all times of war we must strive towards greater unification.

missions.localised_description: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nPeace must always be the solution, so in all times of war we must strive towards greater unification.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nBrokering peace may be a more efficient solution than trying to fend off all simultaneously.

missions.localised_description: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nBrokering peace may be a more efficient solution than trying to fend off all simultaneously.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

missions.localised_description: Three is the perfect number for a balanced union, and a number you should fear. \n\nThe people need not suffer due to squabbling warlords and foolish nobles - we must make peace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nTrade opportunities should be sought beyond our borders, for the advancement of our great cause.

missions.localised_description: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nTrade opportunities should be sought beyond our borders, for the advancement of our great cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nThere may be wisdom in establishing trade agreements with others, so we may grow ever more prosperous!

missions.localised_description: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nThere may be wisdom in establishing trade agreements with others, so we may grow ever more prosperous!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nWe should begin trading, so that we may both benefit from the increase in wealth and relations.

missions.localised_description: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nWe should begin trading, so that we may both benefit from the increase in wealth and relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nA trade agreement would benefit both parties.

missions.localised_description: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nA trade agreement would benefit both parties.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nOur workforce deserve greater rewards, which may be possible through new trade deals.

missions.localised_description: Though we strive to stand alone, it takes many streams merging to form the Yangtze.\n\nOur workforce deserve greater rewards, which may be possible through new trade deals.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Enemies are too easily made when open discussion could avoid conflict.\n\nThere can be no quarter for trespassers. Though we have not quarrelled before, we must not hesitate.

missions.localised_description: Enemies are too easily made when open discussion could avoid conflict.\n\nThere can be no quarter for trespassers. Though we have not quarrelled before, we must not hesitate.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Enemies are too easily made when open discussion could avoid conflict.\n\nThe trespassers have declared no ill intent - perhaps a simple agreement is needed to avoid misunderstandings?

missions.localised_description: Enemies are too easily made when open discussion could avoid conflict.\n\nThe trespassers have declared no ill intent - perhaps a simple agreement is needed to avoid misunderstandings?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people of this vassal state consider you a saviour, and are happy to be led.\n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

missions.localised_description: The people of this vassal state consider you a saviour, and are happy to be led.\n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the economy is slow then it is in danger of drying out completely.\n\nIf our lands do not provide all that we need, maybe trade with others can bolster their shortcomings?

missions.localised_description: If the economy is slow then it is in danger of drying out completely.\n\nIf our lands do not provide all that we need, maybe trade with others can bolster their shortcomings?

localised_description.last_approved_text: A steady economic flow can either flourish or decay.\n\n Our coffers are healthy, but we could strengthen them by forging new trade relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a crucial difference between a thriving populace and an overcrowded one.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: People need a home, just as the land needs people to work it.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When vassals hold their masters in such high regard, assimilation is uncontentious.\n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

missions.localised_description: When vassals hold their masters in such high regard, assimilation is uncontentious.\n\nThere is wisdom in encouraging our vassals to work to our agenda and raise forces against our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We cannot persist in treading water economically, for it will take little to drown us.\n\nIf our lands do not provide all that we need, maybe trade with others can bolster their shortcomings?

missions.localised_description: We cannot persist in treading water economically, for it will take little to drown us.\n\nIf our lands do not provide all that we need, maybe trade with others can bolster their shortcomings?

localised_description.last_approved_text: Surviving is not thriving - nothing should prevent us from achieving greater things.\n\n Our coffers are healthy, but we could strengthen them by forging new trade relations.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

missions.localised_description: Once a settlement reaches full capacity, there is little room for anything.\n\nWhen more cities are needed, more cities should be obtained. By force. March our armies! Take them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No matter its industries, a settlement must have people before expansion is feasible.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

missions.localised_description: No matter its industries, a settlement must have people before expansion is feasible.\n\nA trade agreement would create new work, and give people a reason to move.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wrestling control of a heavily-guarded settlement from the tyrannical warlords will be difficult, my lord. Look for opportunities for expansion elsewhere. Liberating a village from chaos and oppression is the best way to further our cause. Settlements sympathetic to the Yellow Turban cause, also, can be annexed, bringing their resources and benefits under your control

missions.localised_description: Wrestling control of a heavily-guarded settlement from the tyrannical warlords will be difficult, my lord. Look for opportunities for expansion elsewhere. Liberating a village from chaos and oppression is the best way to further our cause. Settlements sympathetic to the Yellow Turban cause, also, can be annexed, bringing their resources and benefits under your control

localised_description.last_approved_text: We should consolidate our hold over our territories and rebuild their infrastructures to better serve the people. If you order the workers to erect new buildings, our settlements will endure.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While our situation is dire, we may still be able to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat. Our soldiers have nothing to lose and are eager to fight. Slay the enemy oppressors, and rekindle the spark of rebellion!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You must prove to the people that you will use power to bring lasting stability. Each step on your path towards enlightenment also brings everyone closer to the Great Peace.

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Strive for Balance in the World

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people are eager to rise up and fight for our cause, my lord. We should organise them under a captain and have them join our army.

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Draw the Wise & the Mighty

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without the Eternal Reason we are powerless. Study the three books, for the wisdom contained therein will strengthen us and could help turn the tide of this conflict.

missions.localised_description: Without the Eternal Reason we are powerless. Study the three books, for the wisdom contained therein will strengthen us and could help turn the tide of this conflict.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rally to our cause, my lord. You have given them hope for a fair and peaceful future. Gather more of them into your armies and soon China will be united under the Yellow Sky.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, we have made great progress in rekindling the flame of rebellion, but still have a long journey before we are at full strength. There are still many oppressed souls beyond our borders awaiting liberation. We should expand and bring them into the fold.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of our greatest strengths is being able to operate free from the restrictions of our tyrannical enemies' military machines. We should build an infrastructure to support our unconventional fighting style.

missions.localised_description: One of our greatest strengths is being able to operate free from the restrictions of our tyrannical enemies' military machines. We should build an infrastructure to support our unconventional fighting style.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rally to our cause, my lord. You have given them hope for a fair and peaceful future. Gather more of them into your armies and soon China will be united under the Yellow Sky.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, our cause is growing in reputation, but we still have a long way to go to regain the Mandate of Heaven and prove the righteousness of our campaign to the rest of China. You should expand your territory and demonstrate your just and virtuous governance.

missions.localised_description: My lord, our cause is growing in reputation, but we still have a long way to go to regain the Mandate of Heaven and prove the righteousness of our campaign to the rest of China. You should expand your territory and demonstrate your just and virtuous governance.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turban's Power Grows as More Commanderies Fly the Yellow Flag

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turban's Power Grows as More Commanderies Fly the Yellow Flag

localised_description.last_approved_text: Heaven looks favourably upon those that use their power to bring equality and peace to the lands.

missions.localised_description: Heaven looks favourably upon those that use their power to bring equality and peace to the lands.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The People Must be Empowered if the Old Ways Are to Be Overthrown

missions.localised_title: The People Must be Empowered if the Old Ways Are to Be Overthrown

localised_description.last_approved_text: By learning to live in harmony with the land around us, we regain heaven's favour and prosperity for the people. You should instruct our scholars to study the texts for anything we can use to improve the quality of our cities.

missions.localised_description: By learning to live in harmony with the land around us, we regain heaven's favour and prosperity for the people. You should instruct our scholars to study the texts for anything we can use to improve the quality of our cities.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Focus & Study, Gong Du Intends to Find the Favour of Heaven

missions.localised_title: Through Focus & Study, Gong Du Intends to Find the Favour of Heaven

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, noblemen sympathetic to the people's cause now flock to our banner. They have sharpened their family weapons and pledged their loyalty to the Yellow Sky. Recruit them when you can, for they are formidable warriors.

missions.localised_description: My lord, noblemen sympathetic to the people's cause now flock to our banner. They have sharpened their family weapons and pledged their loyalty to the Yellow Sky. Recruit them when you can, for they are formidable warriors.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The People's Rebellion Looks to All, Noble & Wealthy, to Grow Its Strength

missions.localised_title: The People's Rebellion Looks to All, Noble & Wealthy, to Grow Its Strength

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, it is time to extend your domain further and continue the liberation of the common people from the unjust tyrants that exploit them.

missions.localised_description: My lord, it is time to extend your domain further and continue the liberation of the common people from the unjust tyrants that exploit them.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Rebellion Threatens to Tip the Balance, Rising Strong Against the Han

missions.localised_title: The Rebellion Threatens to Tip the Balance, Rising Strong Against the Han

localised_description.last_approved_text: We may yet be redeemed in the eyes of heaven, my lord. Through wise and virtuous acts we shall find the key to reclaiming its mandate.

missions.localised_description: We may yet be redeemed in the eyes of heaven, my lord. Through wise and virtuous acts we shall find the key to reclaiming its mandate.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend from the Lowest Valley to the Highest Peak

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend from the Lowest Valley to the Highest Peak

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not all of those in positions of power support tyranny and oppression, my lord. Many nobles and officials wish to join our righteous cause to liberate China and restore a just and virtuous rule. We should seek out these individuals and assure them that we will not judge them by their privilege.

missions.localised_description: Not all of those in positions of power support tyranny and oppression, my lord. Many nobles and officials wish to join our righteous cause to liberate China and restore a just and virtuous rule. We should seek out these individuals and assure them that we will not judge them by their privilege.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

missions.localised_title: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

localised_description.last_approved_text: More and more people accept us as the rightful ones to replace the outdated Han Dynasty, my lord. We must continue to grow - it is essential that our message of hope spreads across China.

missions.localised_description: More and more people accept us as the rightful ones to replace the outdated Han Dynasty, my lord. We must continue to grow - it is essential that our message of hope spreads across China.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Unstoppable Yellow Turbans Seize the Very Heart of China; the Han Crumbles

missions.localised_title: The Unstoppable Yellow Turbans Seize the Very Heart of China; the Han Crumbles

localised_description.last_approved_text: None can stop our rise now, my lord; the time of the Yellow Sky is almost upon us. You, however, must take the final steps towards enlightenment alone. Only then will the Celestial Masters reveal themselves.

missions.localised_description: None can stop our rise now, my lord; the time of the Yellow Sky is almost upon us. You, however, must take the final steps towards enlightenment alone. Only then will the Celestial Masters reveal themselves.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend to Rule & Attain Heaven's Mandate

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend to Rule & Attain Heaven's Mandate

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rulers should not tax the people too hard, and in turn, the people should not overtax the land. The sacred texts are clear: a modest life is a virtuous one.

missions.localised_description: Rulers should not tax the people too hard, and in turn, the people should not overtax the land. The sacred texts are clear: a modest life is a virtuous one.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

missions.localised_title: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wrestling control of a heavily-guarded settlement from the tyrannical warlords will be difficult, my lord. Look for opportunities for expansion elsewhere. Liberating a village from chaos and oppression is the best way to further our cause. Settlements sympathetic to the Yellow Turban cause, also, can be annexed, bringing their resources and benefits under your control.

missions.localised_description: Wrestling control of a heavily-guarded settlement from the tyrannical warlords will be difficult, my lord. Look for opportunities for expansion elsewhere. Liberating a village from chaos and oppression is the best way to further our cause. Settlements sympathetic to the Yellow Turban cause, also, can be annexed, bringing their resources and benefits under your control.

In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Without the Eternal Reason we are powerless. Study the three books, for the wisdom contained therein will strengthen us and could help turn the tide of this conflict.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The people rally to our cause, my lord. You have given them hope for a fair and peaceful future. Gather more of them into your armies and soon China will be united under the Yellow Sky.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, we have made great progress in rekindling the flame of rebellion, but still have a long journey before we are at full strength. There are still many oppressed souls beyond our borders awaiting liberation. We should expand and bring them into the fold.

missions.localised_description: My lord, we have made great progress in rekindling the flame of rebellion, but still have a long journey before we are at full strength. There are still many oppressed souls beyond our borders awaiting liberation. We should expand and bring them into the fold.

missions.localised_title: From Secure Strongholds, the Yellow Turbans Strike Out at Their Enemies

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord! The generals under your command are talented individuals, each with an array of skills they can put to use in improving your realm. In each commandery, they can be sent on assignments to oversee and improve the infrastructure - both military and civic - of your lands. Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

Each character has different qualities to bring to these endeavours, so inspect your options carefully!

localised_title.last_approved_text: The World Must Be Healed; the Yellow Turbans are the Healers

localised_description.last_approved_text: We will not bring about the Divine Peace until we reflect the tranquillity of heaven by healing the land and its people. Constructing a harmonious garden in our settlement will help bring peace to the hearts of all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, our cause is growing in reputation, but we still have a long way to go to regain the Mandate of Heaven and prove the righteousness of our campaign to the rest of China. You should expand your territory and demonstrate your just and virtuous governance.

missions.localised_description: My lord, our cause is growing in reputation, but we still have a long way to go to regain the Mandate of Heaven and prove the righteousness of our campaign to the rest of China. You should expand your territory and demonstrate your just and virtuous governance.

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turban's Power Grows as More Commanderies Fly the Yellow Flag

localised_description.last_approved_text: Heaven looks favourably upon those that use their power to bring equality and peace to the lands.

missions.localised_description: Heaven looks favourably upon those that use their power to bring equality and peace to the lands.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The People Must be Empowered if the Old Ways Are to Be Overthrown

missions.localised_title: The People Must be Empowered if the Old Ways Are to Be Overthrown

localised_description.last_approved_text: New insights are within our grasp, my lord. Study how to plan our cities to exist in harmony with the land, and good fortune will certainly grace us soon.

missions.localised_description: New insights are within our grasp, my lord. Study how to plan our cities to exist in harmony with the land, and good fortune will certainly grace us soon.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

missions.localised_title: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, many of the educated people of the land are convinced by the righteousness of our cause. Scholar-warriors have perfected their training and are willing to join our virtuous armies when led by a Scholar.

missions.localised_description: My lord, many of the educated people of the land are convinced by the righteousness of our cause. Scholar-warriors have perfected their training and are willing to join our virtuous armies when led by a Scholar.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Huang Shao Knows the Way & His Warriors Know it Too

missions.localised_title: Huang Shao Knows the Way & His Warriors Know it Too

localised_description.last_approved_text: My lord, it is time to extend your domain further and continue the liberation of the common people from the unjust tyrants that exploit them.

missions.localised_description: My lord, it is time to extend your domain further and continue the liberation of the common people from the unjust tyrants that exploit them.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Rebellion Threatens to Tip the Balance, Rising Strong Against the Han

missions.localised_title: The Rebellion Threatens to Tip the Balance, Rising Strong Against the Han

localised_description.last_approved_text: We may yet be redeemed in the eyes of heaven, my lord. Through wise and virtuous acts we shall find the key to reclaiming its mandate.

missions.localised_description: We may yet be redeemed in the eyes of heaven, my lord. Through wise and virtuous acts we shall find the key to reclaiming its mandate.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend from the Lowest Valley to the Highest Peak

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend from the Lowest Valley to the Highest Peak

localised_description.last_approved_text: The study of the sacred texts is not the only path towards personal enlightenment. Harmony with one's own body and the mastery of the martial arts are important pillars too. Our scholars should contemplate these truths, my lord.

missions.localised_description: The study of the sacred texts is not the only path towards personal enlightenment. Harmony with one's own body and the mastery of the martial arts are important pillars too. Our scholars should contemplate these truths, my lord.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

missions.localised_title: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights

localised_description.last_approved_text: More and more people accept us as the rightful ones to replace the outdated Han Dynasty, my lord. We must continue to grow - it is essential that our message of hope spreads through China.

missions.localised_description: More and more people accept us as the rightful ones to replace the outdated Han Dynasty, my lord. We must continue to grow - it is essential that our message of hope spreads through China.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Unstoppable Yellow Turbans Seize the Very Heart of China; the Han Crumbles

missions.localised_title: The Unstoppable Yellow Turbans Seize the Very Heart of China; the Han Crumbles

localised_description.last_approved_text: None can stop our rise now, my lord; the time of the Yellow Sky is almost upon us. You, however, must take the final steps towards enlightenment alone. Only then will the Celestial Masters reveal themselves.

missions.localised_description: None can stop our rise now, my lord; the time of the Yellow Sky is almost upon us. You, however, must take the final steps towards enlightenment alone. Only then will the Celestial Masters reveal themselves.

localised_title.last_approved_text: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend to Rule & Attain Heaven's Mandate

missions.localised_title: The Yellow Turbans Must Ascend to Rule & Attain Heaven's Mandate

localised_description.last_approved_text: The study of the sacred texts it not the only path towards personal enlightenment. Harmony with one's own body and the mastery of the martial arts are important pillars too. Our scholars should contemplate these truths, my lord.

missions.localised_description: The study of the sacred texts it not the only path towards personal enlightenment. Harmony with one's own body and the mastery of the martial arts are important pillars too. Our scholars should contemplate these truths, my lord.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Through Study of the Material & the Divine, We Achieve Greater Heights
