missions.localised_description: I am a debug incident, please don't delete my like you did my brothers and sisters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Only when one has mastered the self, can they master the realm. Focus on self-improvement and development, and the rest will surely fall into place.

missions.localised_description: Only when one has mastered the self, can they master the realm. Focus on self-improvement and development, and the rest will surely fall into place.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As great buildings encompass huge cities, the awe inspired tells people that a great nation is rising from the earth. It is this awe that will make China powerful, and great, and bring a harmonious peace.

missions.localised_description: As great buildings encompass huge cities, the awe inspired tells people that a great nation is rising from the earth. It is this awe that will make China powerful, and great, and bring a harmonious peace.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A happy, well-fed populace will hold a nation up through the most difficult of times. And so, you should look to keeping your people happy and fed; for once they are, they will almost certainly do anything for you.

missions.localised_description: A happy, well-fed populace will hold a nation up through the most difficult of times. And so, you should look to keeping your people happy and fed; for once they are, they will almost certainly do anything for you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Wealth will buy anything, including peace. It is an unsavoury method, but a method all the same - amass a fortune so eye-wateringly large that there will be no alternative but to accept the price you offer.

missions.localised_description: Wealth will buy anything, including peace. It is an unsavoury method, but a method all the same - amass a fortune so eye-wateringly large that there will be no alternative but to accept the price you offer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Power over others is the only true power. You must endeavour to have that control over those who would oppose you - and even those who do not. Only when all know you as their master will you be able to end these ceaseless conflicts.

missions.localised_description: Power over others is the only true power. You must endeavour to have that control over those who would oppose you - and even those who do not. Only when all know you as their master will you be able to end these ceaseless conflicts.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The more of the land you directly control, the better you can manage it. To that end, you must bring more territory under your control, as that is how we will know a final, lasting peace.

missions.localised_description: The more of the land you directly control, the better you can manage it. To that end, you must bring more territory under your control, as that is how we will know a final, lasting peace.

localised_description.last_approved_text: When the people prosper, we all shall prosper, and it is only through that prosperity that China will be united. We must strive now to secure a stable economy and livelihood for our people.

missions.localised_description: When the people prosper, we all shall prosper, and it is only through that prosperity that China will be united. We must strive now to secure a stable economy and livelihood for our people.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fear is the only real arbiter of power now, and only through wielding that fear effectively will China know a stable, lasting peace. It is time to move, to show China that fear, and through it, peace.

missions.localised_description: Fear is the only real arbiter of power now, and only through wielding that fear effectively will China know a stable, lasting peace. It is time to move, to show China that fear, and through it, peace.

localised_title.last_approved_text: A New Dynasty: Rule Through Fear

missions.localised_title: A New Dynasty: Rule Through Fear

localised_description.last_approved_text: War only breeds more war; making enemies only creates more enemies. True peace, and true stability, will come through reconciling with our foes and working together for a better future.

missions.localised_description: War only breeds more war; making enemies only creates more enemies. True peace, and true stability, will come through reconciling with our foes and working together for a better future.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our victory will come through military might! To that end, we must begin raising and maintaining a mighty army, then use it to sweep away any who would oppose us.

missions.localised_description: Our victory will come through military might! To that end, we must begin raising and maintaining a mighty army, then use it to sweep away any who would oppose us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cao Huan was the last emperor of Wei and still holds privileged status at the court. He may be able to interceded on your behalf and entreat the empress to halt this course of madness!

missions.localised_description: Cao Huan was the last emperor of Wei and still holds privileged status at the court. He may be able to interceded on your behalf and entreat the empress to halt this course of madness!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress may have made a move to destroy you, but should you strike first things may soon change. Destroy one of her dispatched lackeys and she may soon alter her opinion of this war.

missions.localised_description: The empress may have made a move to destroy you, but should you strike first things may soon change. Destroy one of her dispatched lackeys and she may soon alter her opinion of this war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress has made her move and now her agents descend upon you to take your lands by force. Yet the fight is not done yet - if you are able to rally your forces and show strength the empress may reconsider her belligerent position.

missions.localised_description: The empress has made her move and now her agents descend upon you to take your lands by force. Yet the fight is not done yet - if you are able to rally your forces and show strength the empress may reconsider her belligerent position.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Enemies are bearing down upon you - the empress' vile plots carry them on the wind to you. Yet all is not lost - if you can raise enough funds you may be able to buy your way out of this problem one way or another.

missions.localised_description: Enemies are bearing down upon you - the empress' vile plots carry them on the wind to you. Yet all is not lost - if you can raise enough funds you may be able to buy your way out of this problem one way or another.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress does not seem thrilled at your offer: \n\n "This is the best you can offer me? Fine, so be it. But be aware, if you fail me there will be repercussions…"

missions.localised_description: The empress does not seem thrilled at your offer: \n\n "This is the best you can offer me? Fine, so be it. But be aware, if you fail me there will be repercussions…"

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress seems overjoyed at your aggressive determination: \n\n "Yes, such spirit! I have no doubt you will be victorious."

missions.localised_description: The empress seems overjoyed at your aggressive determination: \n\n "Yes, such spirit! I have no doubt you will be victorious."

localised_description.last_approved_text: The response from the empress is short, sharp and does not allow for any misinterpretation: \n\n "Good. Destroy them at once. Do not fail me."

missions.localised_description: The response from the empress is short, sharp and does not allow for any misinterpretation: \n\n "Good. Destroy them. Do not fail me."

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress' reply is as curt as it is definitive: \n\n "It is only fair that each must pay however they can, with whatever means they can. Regardless of the method, however, I do expect you to deliver…"

missions.localised_description: The empress' reply is as curt as it is definitive: \n\n "It is only fair that each must pay however they can, with whatever means they can. Regardless of the method, however, I do expect you to deliver…"

localised_description.last_approved_text: The empress does not seem thrilled at your offer: \n\n "This is the best you can offer me? Fine, so be it. But be aware, if you fail me there will be repercussions…"

missions.localised_description: The empress does not seem thrilled at your offer: \n\n "This is the best you can offer me? Fine, so be it. But be aware, if you fail me there will be repercussions…"

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor's decree must be obtained if he is to know freedom from the clutches of his captors. A spy must be sent, as soon as possible, to the imperial court, and the decree thus obtained!

missions.localised_description: The emperor's decree must be obtained if he is to know freedom from the clutches of his captors. A spy must be sent, as soon as possible, to the imperial court, and the decree thus obtained!
Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is a storm brewing in the imperial court, Sima Ai. Every prince of Jin views the situation with opportunity in their eyes, and with good reason. Yet you must stand on your principles and defend the dynasty! \n\n There are brigands and bandits in your lands, come to make merry amidst the chaos. Show them steel and justice!

missions.localised_description: There is a storm brewing in the imperial court, Sima Ai. Every prince of Jin views the situation with opportunity in their eyes, and with good reason. Yet you must stand on your principles and defend the dynasty! \n\n There are brigands and bandits in your lands, come to make merry amidst the chaos. Show them steel and justice!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The emperor is beset on all sides, Sima Jiong, as your avaricious kin and the empress vie for control of his fragile throne. There are few amongst them capable of steering the dynasty - yet you have this talent. \n\n If you are to aid the emperor, however, the knaves that march in your lands now must be put down. Only once you have demonstrated your strength, can the dynasty be saved by your hand!

missions.localised_description: The emperor is beset on all sides, Sima Jiong, as your avaricious kin and the empress vie for control of his fragile throne. There are few amongst them capable of steering the dynasty - yet you have this talent. \n\n If you are to aid the emperor, however, the knaves that march in your lands now must be put down. Only once you have demonstrated your strength, can the dynasty be saved by your hand!

localised_description.last_approved_text: For generations, you have watched and advised the leaders of the Jin, yet now the wolves hunger and come snapping at your heels. It is an insulting turn of events, but you must move quickly to survive all the same. \n\n The empress, using the poor emperor as her mouthpiece, has sent armies to arrest you - you must fight back! Only when the immediate threat is cleared can you decide how to proceed.

missions.localised_description: For generations, you have watched and advised the leaders of the Jin, yet now the wolves hunger and come snapping at your heels. It is an insulting turn of events, but you must move quickly to survive all the same. \n\n The empress, using the poor emperor as her mouthpiece, has sent armies to arrest you - you must fight back! Only when the immediate threat is cleared can you decide how to proceed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: China has begun another descent into chaos, and it is in chaos that you may more easily make your mark, Sima Lun. The emperor is in the thrall of the empress, and the other princes march to her beat. \n\n You are positioned well to ally yourself with whoever is most beneficial to your cause, but first a show of strength. Destroy the fools and then you can look to more important matters.

missions.localised_description: China has begun another descent into chaos, and it is in chaos that you may more easily make your mark, Sima Lun. The emperor is in the thrall of the empress, and the other princes march to her beat. \n\n You are positioned well to ally yourself with whoever is most beneficial to your cause, but first a show of strength. Destroy the fools and then you can look to more important matters.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sima Wei! China is on the brink of civil war once again, and there is a name to made for yourself if you can fight above the chaos. And now, at last, that opportunity arises. \n\n You have been charged with a most important mission by the empress - the Wei Guan has been branded a traitor and your forces advance now to apprehend him. In the name the emperor, bring this treason to justice!

missions.localised_description: Sima Wei! China is on the brink of civil war once again, and there is a name to made for yourself if you can fight above the chaos. And now, at last, that opportunity arises. \n\n You have been charged with a most important mission by the empress - the Wei Guan has been branded a traitor and your forces advance now to apprehend him. In the name the emperor, bring this treason to justice!

localised_description.last_approved_text: As China slides once more towards destruction, somebody must think of the people. Sima Ying, you have long been regarded as a good governor and are beloved by all. Is there not something you can do to quell this madness? \n\n Before you can, however, you must first defeat the army marching in your lands. These may be dark times, but order must be upheld!

missions.localised_description: As China slides once more towards destruction, somebody must think of the people. Sima Ying, you have long been regarded as a good governor and are beloved by all. Is there not something you can do to quell this madness? \n\n Before you can, however, you must first defeat the army marching in your lands. These may be dark times, but order must be upheld!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time has at last come, Sima Yong, for you to take advantage of the growing chaos and finally achieve your ambition. Your kin, the squabbling princes, fight over the emperor, but you could rise above them all to seize more than just the regency - the very throne itself! \n\n But first, a nuisance has presented itself in your lands. Sweep them away, so that we can move on.

missions.localised_description: The time has at last come, Sima Yong, for you to take advantage of the growing chaos and finally achieve your ambition. Your kin, the squabbling princes, fight over the emperor, but you could rise above them all to seize more than just the regency - the very throne itself! \n\n But first, a nuisance has presented itself in your lands. Sweep them away, so that we can move on.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The imperial court is threatened, Sima Yue, both from external forces and internal corruption. The princes of Jin are begin to devour themselves in the quest for power, but you stand ready to defend the emperor directly! \n\n Yet before you can aid him you must remove this direct threat before you. Crush this army, and swiftly!

missions.localised_description: The imperial court is threatened, Sima Yue, both from external forces and internal corruption. The princes of Jin are begin to devour themselves in the quest for power, but you stand ready to defend the emperor directly! \n\n Yet before you can aid him you must remove this direct threat before you. Crush this army, and swiftly!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The events in motion cannot be stopped now, and you must look to act as you think is best. You are loathe to declare wars and decry your kin, so you can instead look to improve the lot of your people as chaos reigns. Investigate reforms that better your lands, and hope this will change hearts and minds.

missions.localised_description: The events in motion cannot be stopped now, and you must look to act as you think is best. You are loathe to declare wars and decry your kin, so you can instead look to improve the lot of your people as chaos reigns. Investigate reforms that better your lands, and hope this will change hearts and minds.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Authority cannot simply be taken; it is innate and must be honed. You are seen as an authoritative figure, but you must continue to strive to prove it. Develop your skills and focus inwardly and they will all see your authority soon enough.

missions.localised_description: Authority cannot simply be taken; it is innate and must be honed. You are seen as an authoritative figure, but you must continue to strive to prove it. Develop your skills and focus inwardly and they will all see your authority soon enough.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are a respected and admired leader, and war is upon us. Territories across the land are falling to war and discord; the people and the court look to you for guidance. But you will not simply conquer by brute force, as your wayward family members do – your stewardship of the realm will be founded in tradition, law and cooperation. Use your diplomatic authority to secure the co-operation of one prince, and others will surely follow.

missions.localised_description: You are a respected and admired leader, and war is upon us. Territories across the land are falling to war and discord; the people and the court look to you for guidance. But you will not simply conquer by brute force, as your wayward family members do – your stewardship of the realm will be founded in tradition, law and cooperation. Use your diplomatic authority to secure the cooperation of one Prince, and others will surely follow.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]If the number of regions you control directly exceeds your domain, you will suffer penalties. You can increase your domain by increasing your jurisdiction, which is gained from buildings and by gaining vassals via the ‘Secure co-operation’ diplomatic option.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]If the number of regions you control directly exceeds your domain, you will suffer penalties. You can increase your domain by increasing your jurisdiction, which is gained from buildings and by gaining vassals via the ‘Secure co-operation’ diplomatic option.[[/i]]

localised_description.last_approved_text: If you are to conquer your enemies, then you must understand them. A well-placed spy amongst the court of that angry fool, Sima Wei, will give you untold access to his dealings, and ultimately make him easier to defeat!

missions.localised_description: If you are to conquer your enemies, then you must understand them. A well-placed spy amongst the court of that angry fool, Sima Wei, will give you untold access to his dealings, and ultimately make him easier to defeat!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who have crossed you will incur your ire. There must be swift and terrible vengeance, so that all understand the price. Your wrath is a tempest - direct its fury!

missions.localised_description: Those who have crossed you will incur your ire. There must be swift and terrible vengeance, so that all understand the price. Your wrath is a tempest - direct its fury!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You are beloved as a governor and renowned for your administrative abilities, but no government survives alone. You must be surrounded by strong, wise people to aid you. To that end, send one of your associates out to work in your name!

missions.localised_description: You are beloved as a governor and renowned for your administrative abilities, but no government survives alone. You must be surrounded by strong, wise people to aid you. To that end, send one of your associates out to work in your name!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Do not let these moments pass you by, Sima Yong, for somebody else will surely seize the opportunities in your stead. You must have a strong military to see your plans become reality, so secure inviolable garrisons and a solid recruitment infrastructure with which to obtain it. Build, and see your ambitions spread across China!

missions.localised_description: Do not let these moments pass you by, Sima Yong, for somebody else will surely seize the opportunities in your stead. You must have a strong military to see your plans become reality, so secure inviolable garrisons and a solid recruitment infrastructure with which to obtain it. Build, and see your ambitions spread across China!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is time that the people's potential was turned into great structures that glorify Chinese culture. Sima Yue, you are known as a talented overseer - if you were to administrate the construction of works across the land, the people - and the court - would surely take note.

missions.localised_description: It is time that the people's potential was turned into great structures that glorify Chinese culture. Sima Yue, you are known as a talented overseer - if you were to administrate the construction of works across the land, the people - and the court - would surely take note.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chaos consumes the land, but you remain the emperor's dutiful brother and servant, Sima Ai. To whatever end, you will uphold the dynasty, even if you must fight your own family. \n\n Yet be wary of the other princes, whose favours shift like leaves in the breeze - your actions may make enemies friends and friends enemies; beware their fickle favours...

missions.localised_description: Chaos consumes the land, but you remain the emperor's dutiful brother and servant, Sima Ai. To whatever end, you will uphold the dynasty, even if you must fight your own family. \n\n Yet be wary of the other princes, whose favours shift like leaves in the breeze - your actions may make enemies friends and friends enemies; beware their fickle favours...

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]Capturing the imperial capital, Luoyang, is a crucial step to securing your power. You are free to make the attempt at any time, but be careful – doing so without sufficient authority might have unintended consequences. Building your prestige is the most certain way to prove that you are fit to lead China – but there may be other, hidden ways.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]Capturing the imperial capital, Luoyang, is a crucial step to securing your power. You are free to make the attempt at any time, but be careful – doing so without sufficient authority might have unintended consequences. Building your prestige is the most certain way to prove that you are fit to lead China – but there may be other, hidden ways.[[/i]]

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Jin dynasty slides inexorably into conflict, you must remember to fight for your family at all times. You have been a staunch and well-regarded leader, but the family stain still lies indelibly upon your legacy. \n\n A time may be coming where you may excise the taint from your father's name, but you must be ready for the cost that time may exact.

localised_description.last_approved_text: You have survived the first onslaught, and can perhaps take a slight reprieve. However, the empress will not stop - of this, you can be certain. \n\n However, you must remain resolute, and defy her accusations at every turn. It is possible, in the face of your continued defiance, that the empress may reconsider her campaign against you.

missions.localised_description: You have survived the first onslaught, and can perhaps take a slight reprieve. However, the empress will not stop - of this, you can be certain. \n\n However, you must remain resolute, and defy her accusations at every turn. It is possible, in the face of your continued defiance, that the empress may reconsider her campaign against you.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]Capturing the imperial capital, Luoyang, is a crucial step to securing your power. You are free to make the attempt at any time, but be careful – doing so without sufficient authority might have unintended consequences. Building your prestige is the most certain way to prove that you are fit to lead China – but there may be other, hidden ways.[[/i]]

missions.localised_supplementary_text: [[i]]Capturing the imperial capital, Luoyang, is a crucial step to securing your power. localised_description.last_approved_text: The war you long anticipated has at last come, Sima Lun, and you have started on a conquest that will not stop until you sit upon the throne. You must continue pressing this advantage before the other princes move to stop you. \n\n Be wary of the cost of your endeavours, especially upon your people and allies, but do not waver from what you must do to achieve victory.

missions.localised_description: The war you long anticipated has at last come, Sima Lun, and you have started on a conquest that will not stop until you sit upon the throne. You must continue pressing this advantage before the other princes move to stop you. \n\n Be wary of the cost of your endeavours, especially upon your people and allies, but do not waver from what you must do to achieve victory.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your opening manoeuvres have been successful, Sima Wei, but you cannot rest on your achievements, nor let them sour into complacency. \n\n Although you have been the war dog of the empress, be wary of her machinations. It is possible she is playing a much larger game than you realise. However, you must also press on and crush the enemies of China.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The wars have begun in earnest now, Sima Ying, and you must focus on what is most important if China is to be redeemed and the dynasty saved. The people want for succour, and must be sustained, but so too must the other princes and the court be appeased. \n\n Tread carefully, for the ground beneath you is febrile and fraught.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is clear now that the Jin's disagreements can only be solved in the crucible of war. There is no telling how the coming wars may proceed, but you must remain true to your cause, no matter what. \n\n You cannot shy from conflict when it comes, but continue striving towards harmony and greater knowledge whenever possible...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The opening stages of this conflict are done, Sima Yue, and you have endured it with grace. Now you must look to continue pressing your advantage if the emperor is to be defended. \n\n However, be wary of the other princes, who will attempt to stop you by any means, military or otherwise; greed corrupts the very heart of the court and you must be on your guard for it.

missions.localised_description: Success
Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time has come - you have gained sufficient influence that you can now make your move on the Capital, Luoyang. Conquest is the most direct route, but a diplomatic annexation may also be possible.

missions.localised_description: The time has come - you have gained sufficient influence that you can now make your move on the Capital, Luoyang. Conquest is the most direct route, but a diplomatic annexation may also be possible.

localised_supplementary_text.last_approved_text: [[i]]You are now of sufficient rank to guarantee at least some support were you to take the imperial capital. Doing so will greatly boost your prestige and bring you closer to victory.[[/i]]

missions.localised_description: Success
